original: @10a * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @10a * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya aa nanta mu kha nirha ra dh'a ra ni t'i k'a /
analyzed: a'arya aa nanta mu kha nirha ra dh'a ra ni t'i k'a /
translated: Ārya-anantamukhanirhāra-dhāraṇī-tīkā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The Extensive Commentary on the Dhāraṇī of Achieving Infinite Gates

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang chos dang ni //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang chos dang ni //
translated: Having paid homage to the perfect Buddha, the Dharma,

original: dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal nas //🔽mtha' yas sgo sgrub gzungs kyi don //
analyzed: dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal nas // mtha' yas sgo sgrub gzungs kyi don //
translated: and also to the Saṅgha,🔽I will briefly analyze the meaning

original: mdor bsdus rnam par dbye bar bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus rnam par dbye bar bya //
translated: of the dhāraṇī of achieving infinite gates.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang @10b bcas pa shes bya kun gyi yang dag thugs su chud gyur pa'i //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang @10b bcas pa shes bya kun gyi yang dag thugs su chud gyur pa'i //
translated: The perfect buddhas and their heirs have fully realized all objects of knowledge.

original: spyod yul zab mo'i gzungs 'di ji ga bdag 'dra nyon mongs blo zhan pa yis ga la lcogs //
analyzed: spyod yul zab mo'i gzungs 'di ji ga bdag 'dra nyon mongs blo zhan pa yis ga la lcogs //
translated: How could someone like me, with afflictions and a feeble mind, comprehend this profound dhāraṇī?

original: de ni gnas ma yin par shin tu mngon bzhin 'on kyang gzungs don rnam par dbye bar bya //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin par shin tu mngon bzhin 'on kyang gzungs don rnam par dbye bar bya //
translated: It is most certainly not possible. Nevertheless, I will analyze the meaning of the dhāraṇī.

original: bdag ni dad pas gus par bskul la gzhan dbang blo can dag gis mi bya ci yang med //
analyzed: bdag ni dad pas gus par bskul la gzhan dbang blo can dag gis mi bya ci yang med //
translated: I, however, am moved by faith and respect. Those who are powerless and weak should not do anything at all.

original: 'jig rten ma lus yang dag 'dod pa'i dngos po sgrub pa yi //
analyzed: 'jig rten ma lus yang dag 'dod pa'i dngos po sgrub pa yi //
translated: All the people in the world are not able to accomplish the things they truly desire.

original: mthu dang ldan pa ma yin dman zhing don kyang ma byas pas //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa ma yin dman zhing don kyang ma byas pas //
translated: I am inferior and have not done what needs to be done.

original: bdag ni tshe rabs phye ma la yang skye bo 'di 'dra bar //
analyzed: bdag ni tshe rabs phye ma la yang skye bo 'di 'dra bar //
translated: I am afraid that in future lives I will be like this person.

original: 'gyur du dogs phyir 'di lus rab tu dbye bar bya //
analyzed: 'gyur du dogs phyir 'di lus rab tu dbye bar bya //
translated: Therefore, I will divide up this body.🔽Having examined the introduction, the setting,

original: gleng bslang ba dang gleng gzhi dang // 'dus pa dang ni dgos pa la //
analyzed: gleng bslang ba dang gleng gzhi dang // 'dus pa dang ni dgos pa la //
translated: the assembly, and the purpose,🔽I have earnestly requested

original: yang dag brtags nas don chen phyir //🔽zhu ba la ni nan tan byas //
analyzed: yang dag brtags nas don chen phyir // zhu ba la ni nan tan byas //
translated: for the sake of the great meaning.

original: don phye bas na thub pa la //
analyzed: don phye bas na thub pa la //
translated: The Sage, having analyzed the meaning,

original: rgya cher mkhyen par gsol ba dang // thub la gsol ba 'debs pa dang // dam bca' mngon du phyogs bya dang // bsrung dang gzungs kyi ngo bo dang // de la bstod dang phan yon dang // 'thob pa'i thabs dang phan yon dang // de yi sngon byung brjod pa dang //
analyzed: rgya cher mkhyen par gsol ba dang // thub la gsol ba 'debs pa dang // dam bca' mngon du phyogs bya dang // bsrung dang gzungs kyi ngo bo dang // de la bstod dang phan yon dang // 'thob pa'i thabs dang phan yon dang // de yi sngon byung brjod pa dang //
translated: and the narration of their past events,🔽the greatness of the Dharma classification,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs che nyid dang // ming zhus pa dang bya ba gnyis //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs che nyid dang // ming zhus pa dang bya ba gnyis //
translated: the request for the name, and the two actions,

original: yi rangs par yang bstan pa ste //
analyzed: yi rangs par yang bstan pa ste //
translated: and the teaching of rejoicing,

original: 'di la 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: here it is summarized.

original: mdo 'dir don rnam pa bcu dgus bstan te de la yang dag par sdud par byed pas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du brjod pas yang dag bsdu bar bya ba'i don phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'i phyir thog mar gleng bslang ba bstan te /
analyzed: mdo 'dir don rnam pa bcu dgus bstan te de la yang dag par sdud par byed pas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du brjod pas yang dag bsdu bar bya ba'i don phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'i phyir thog mar gleng bslang ba bstan te /
translated: In this sutra, it is taught by nineteen topics. Therein, the compiler, by expressing his own reliability, in order to unerringly teach the meaning to be compiled, first teaches the introduction.

original: phyin ci ma log par bstan pa de yang gdul bya'i skye bo the tshom med par 'di la gzung pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log par bstan pa de yang gdul bya'i skye bo the tshom med par 'di la gzung pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that unerring teaching is for the sake of the disciples' being led to hold to it without doubt.

original: de'i 'og tu gleng gzhi ni bstan pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir de bstan to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gleng gzhi ni bstan pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir de bstan to //
translated: Then the setting is taught, because it is the basis of the teaching.

original: de nas bstan pa'i gnas de yin pa'i phyir dang // de'i dgos pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams 'dus pa bstan to //
analyzed: de nas bstan pa'i gnas de yin pa'i phyir dang // de'i dgos pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams 'dus pa bstan to //
translated: Then the assembly is taught, because it is the place of the teaching and because it is the purpose of the teaching.

original: de nas 'khor 'dus pa mthong nas dgos pa la brtags pa'i zhu ba bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de nas 'khor 'dus pa mthong nas dgos pa la brtags pa'i zhu ba bya ba bstan to //
translated: Then, having seen the assembled assembly, the request is taught, which is the examination of the purpose.

original: de nas de ltar dgos pa la brtags te gzhag pa'i don bcom ldan 'das la mkhyen par gsol ba bstan to //
analyzed: de nas de ltar dgos pa la brtags te gzhag pa'i don bcom ldan 'das la mkhyen par gsol ba bstan to //
translated: Then, having thus examined the purpose, the request to the Lord is taught, which is the matter to be set forth.

original: de nas mkhyen par gsol ba'i don la dgos pa yod pa'i phyir des na de nyid kyi phyir bstan par dam bca' ba bstan to //🔽de nas dris pa dang @11a * //
analyzed: de nas mkhyen par gsol ba'i don la dgos pa yod pa'i phyir des na de nyid kyi phyir bstan par dam bca' ba bstan to // de nas dris pa dang @11a * //
translated: Then, because the matter of the request has a purpose, the promise to teach is taught, for that very reason.

original: lan gdab pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir 'dri ba po mngon du phyogs par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: lan gdab pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir 'dri ba po mngon du phyogs par bya ba bstan to //
translated: Then, in order to express the greatness of the question and answer, the questioner is directed.

original: de nas bdud la sogs pas gnod pa byed pa bsal ba'i phyir kun nas bsrung ba bstan to //
analyzed: de nas bdud la sogs pas gnod pa byed pa bsal ba'i phyir kun nas bsrung ba bstan to //
translated: Then, in order to dispel the harm of demons and so forth, the protection is taught.

original: de nas bsrung ba rnyed pa la sems can rnams 'di la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyar dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten yin pas 'dri ba po'i don 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir che ba nyid brjod pa'i don du gzungs kyi ngo bo bstan to //
analyzed: de nas bsrung ba rnyed pa la sems can rnams 'di la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyar dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten yin pas 'dri ba po'i don 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir che ba nyid brjod pa'i don du gzungs kyi ngo bo bstan to //
translated: Then, in order to generate respect for this attainment of protection in sentient beings and to accomplish the desired aims of the questioner, the essence of the dhāraṇī is taught for the purpose of expressing its greatness.

original: de nas sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / lhag par gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir che ba nyid brjod pa'i don du gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid de la bstod pa bstan to //
analyzed: de nas sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / lhag par gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir che ba nyid brjod pa'i don du gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid de la bstod pa bstan to //
translated: Then, in order to express its greatness for the purpose of generating enthusiasm and special respect in sentient beings, the praise of that essence of the dhāraṇī is taught.

original: de nas 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pas kyang sems can rnams de la gzung ba'i phyir gzungs kyi ngo bo'i phan yon brjod do //
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pas kyang sems can rnams de la gzung ba'i phyir gzungs kyi ngo bo'i phan yon brjod do //
translated: Then, in order to cause sentient beings to uphold it by also teaching its result, the benefits of the essence of the dhāraṇī are expressed.

original: de nas gzungs kyi 'bras bu thos nas mchog tu dga' ba dga' ston lta bu skyes pas thob par bya ba'i thabs tshol bas de'i 'og tu de thob par bya ba'i thabs bstan to //
analyzed: de nas gzungs kyi 'bras bu thos nas mchog tu dga' ba dga' ston lta bu skyes pas thob par bya ba'i thabs tshol bas de'i 'og tu de thob par bya ba'i thabs bstan to //
translated: Then, having heard the result of the dhāraṇī, he generates the supreme joy of a festival, and because he seeks the means of attaining it, after that the means of attaining it is taught.

original: de nas de la gus par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dang / gzungs kyi ngo bo'i che ba nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de la gus par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dang / gzungs kyi ngo bo'i che ba nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to engage in it with respect and in order to proclaim the greatness of the essence of the dhāraṇī,

original: de thob par bya ba'i thabs la 'jug pa'i phan yon bstan to //
analyzed: de thob par bya ba'i thabs la 'jug pa'i phan yon bstan to //
translated: the benefits of engaging in the means of attaining it are taught.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu gzungs la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de la nges pa shin tu brtan pa bskyed pa'i phyir sngon byung ba bstan to //
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu gzungs la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de la nges pa shin tu brtan pa bskyed pa'i phyir sngon byung ba bstan to //
translated: Then, after that, in order to generate firm certainty in that result of the dhāraṇī and so forth, the past events are taught.

original: des 'dod pa'i don rab tu bsgrubs nas kyang brjod par bya ba dang brjod pa la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des 'dod pa'i don rab tu bsgrubs nas kyang brjod par bya ba dang brjod pa la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Having accomplished the desired purpose, in order to generate respect for the expression and the expressed,

original: de'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid mjug sdud par byed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid mjug sdud par byed do //
translated: after that, the greatness of the Dharma discourse is concluded.

original: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid thob ste dga' ba skyes nas tha snyad du bya ba'i phyir ming zhu'o //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid thob ste dga' ba skyes nas tha snyad du bya ba'i phyir ming zhu'o //
translated: Then, having attained the greatness of the Dharma teaching, he is delighted and asks for a name in order to designate it conventionally.

original: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi 'bras bu'i bye brag yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ming 'dogs so //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi 'bras bu'i bye brag yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ming 'dogs so //
translated: Then, in order to demonstrate the specific results of the Dharma teaching, he gives it a name.

original: de nas mdo yongs su rdzogs pa na /
analyzed: de nas mdo yongs su rdzogs pa na /
translated: Then, when the sutra is complete,

original: bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa don med ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa don med ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to demonstrate that the Blessed One's teaching of the Dharma is not meaningless,

original: thams cad kyang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu thob par gyur to zhes rab tu bstan pa'i don du yi rang ba bstan te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu thob par gyur to zhes rab tu bstan pa'i don du yi rang ba bstan te /
translated: it is taught that everyone attained the result according to their fortune.

original: don de dag gi sbyar ba ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: don de dag gi sbyar ba ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: The application of these meanings is like that.

original: de la / bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: de la / bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i bye brag gis //
translated: In that regard,

original: gleng bslang rnam pa brgyad du bstan //
analyzed: gleng bslang rnam pa brgyad du bstan //
translated: the introduction is taught to be of eight types🔽by the distinctions of what is to be accomplished and the accomplishment.

original: mdor na 'di la bsgrub bya gsum //
analyzed: mdor na 'di la bsgrub bya gsum //
translated: In brief, here, there are three things to be accomplished

original: sgrub pa rnam pa lngar @11b 'dod do //
analyzed: sgrub pa rnam pa lngar @11b 'dod do //
translated: and five types of accomplishment are asserted.

original: 'di ltar gleng bslang ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gleng bslang ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the introduction is twofold, by way of the distinction between what is to be established and the establishment.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni yang dag par sdud par byed pas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni yang dag par sdud par byed pas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du bya ba yin te /
translated: What is to be established is the establishment of oneself as a valid person by means of correct collection.

original: de'i tshig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzhan dag gis nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / nges pa skyes nas mi rnams nan tan byed pa la gnas pas 'dod pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzhan dag gis nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / nges pa skyes nas mi rnams nan tan byed pa la gnas pas 'dod pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: This is because, by means of his words, others generate certainty in this Dharma teaching, and having generated certainty, they abide in the practice and attain the desired goal.

original: de lta ma yin na mi 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mi 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it is taught that they will not attain it.

original: tshad ma nyid du bya ba de yang yul dang / lus dang / rang gi ngo bo dang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid du bya ba de yang yul dang / lus dang / rang gi ngo bo dang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
translated: That establishment as a valid person is shown by way of three topics: the object, the body, and the essence.

original: de la yul ni mdo'i don 'og nas 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: de la yul ni mdo'i don 'og nas 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: The object is the meaning of the sūtra that will be explained below.

original: lus ni bdag nyid de yang dag par sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lus ni bdag nyid de yang dag par sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The body is oneself, the one who correctly collects.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nges par 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nges par 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The essence is the apprehension by means of ear consciousness.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum gyis de dag go rims bzhin du bstan to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum gyis de dag go rims bzhin du bstan to //
translated: The three phrases beginning with “thus” indicate the following:

original: sgrub pa ni rnam pa lngas bstan te /
analyzed: sgrub pa ni rnam pa lngas bstan te /
translated: The establishment is shown by five aspects:

original: dus kyi bye brag ni dus gcig na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dus kyi bye brag ni dus gcig na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The distinction of time is “at one time.”

original: de yang gang gi tshe gong ma dang sbyar na de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyi nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang du thos par bstan te /
analyzed: de yang gang gi tshe gong ma dang sbyar na de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyi nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang du thos par bstan te /
translated: Moreover, if this is applied to the above, then in order to generate certainty in the retinue, it shows that the self is of great learning.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis dus gcig na 'di thos kyi dus gzhan na yang gzhan dag thos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis dus gcig na 'di thos kyi dus gzhan na yang gzhan dag thos so //
translated: Thus, “I heard this at one time, but at another time I heard something else.”

original: de bas na bdag gi mang du thos pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na bdag gi mang du thos pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, “I am of great learning,”

original: de'i bdag gi tshig ni yid ches par bya ba yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag gi tshig ni yid ches par bya ba yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it shows that one should have confidence in my words.

original: gang gi tshe 'og ma dang sbyar na de'i tshe dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na bzhugs kyi dus gzhan gyi tshe ni gud na yang bzhugs te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'og ma dang sbyar na de'i tshe dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na bzhugs kyi dus gzhan gyi tshe ni gud na yang bzhugs te /
translated: If this is applied to the below, then “at one time the Bhagavān was dwelling in the city of Vaiśālī,” but at another time he was dwelling elsewhere.

original: de bas na yul de dag kyang legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin par bstan to //
analyzed: de bas na yul de dag kyang legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin par bstan to //
translated: Therefore, those objects are also to be relied upon by those who desire the good.

original: byed pa po'i bye brag ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ste /
analyzed: byed pa po'i bye brag ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ste /
translated: The distinction of the agent is “the Lord.”

original: bdud bzhi bcom pa'am /
analyzed: bdud bzhi bcom pa'am /
translated: He is the Lord because he has destroyed the four demons,

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas byed pa po khyad par du 'phags te /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas byed pa po khyad par du 'phags te /
translated: or because he is distinguished as the agent because he possesses the qualities of the Lord, etc.

original: 'di ni 'di lta bu zhig gis bstan pa las ni phyin ci ma log pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di lta bu zhig gis bstan pa las ni phyin ci ma log pa yin no //
translated: This is taught by one who is not mistaken, because this earth abides in this way.

original: sa gzhi 'di ni 'di lta bu zhig gnas pa las na bsod nams kyi khyas par dang ldan pa yin gyi the tshom ma byed cig par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa gzhi 'di ni 'di lta bu zhig gnas pa las na bsod nams kyi khyas par dang ldan pa yin gyi the tshom ma byed cig par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is endowed with the distinction of merit, one should not doubt it.

original: bya ba'i bre brag ni bzhugs te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bya ba'i bre brag ni bzhugs te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The distinction of action is “abiding.”

original: lha dang tshangs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyis @12a * //
analyzed: lha dang tshangs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyis @12a * //
translated: He abides by means of the abodes of the gods, Brahma, the Buddhas, etc.

original: gnas pa'o // yang na rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdul bya rnams kyi sems 'phrog pas gnas pa ste //
analyzed: gnas pa'o // yang na rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdul bya rnams kyi sems 'phrog pas gnas pa ste //
translated: Or else, he abides by means of the various kinds of miracles, etc., which captivate the minds of those to be trained.

original: 'di gnyis kyis ni bcom ldan 'das tshul yongs su dag pa dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba la mkhas par yang bstan to //
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyis ni bcom ldan 'das tshul yongs su dag pa dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba la mkhas par yang bstan to //
translated: These two verses show the Lord's purity of conduct and his skill in the work of helping others.

original: yul gyi bye brag ni yul yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yul gyi bye brag ni yul yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The particular place is stated: in the great forest of Vaishali, in the upper shrine of the multistoried building.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That is threefold:

original: longs spyod pa'i phyir nye ba dang rab tu nye ba dang shin tu nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: longs spyod pa'i phyir nye ba dang rab tu nye ba dang shin tu nye bar bstan to //
translated: it is shown to be near, very near, and extremely near, for the sake of enjoyment.

original: nye ba dang rab tu nye ba dang / shin tu nye ba dag gis ni 'jig rten gyi gus pa'i khyad par chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chan po bskyed pas bsod nams kyi phung po'i khyad par chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba dang rab tu nye ba dang / shin tu nye ba dag gis ni 'jig rten gyi gus pa'i khyad par chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chan po bskyed pas bsod nams kyi phung po'i khyad par chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The near, the very near, and the extremely near generate the lesser, medium, and great degrees of respect in the world, and so generate the lesser, medium, and great degrees of the mass of merit.

original: tha gru che ba'i phyir yangs pa'o //
analyzed: tha gru che ba'i phyir yangs pa'o //
translated: It is great in extent, thus it is great.

original: yang na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'byor ba rgya chen pos de na gnas pa'i phyir yangs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'byor ba rgya chen pos de na gnas pa'i phyir yangs pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is extensive because the Brahmins and householders live there in great affluence.

original: zha 'bring ba'i bye brag ni bsod nams che bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zha 'bring ba'i bye brag ni bsod nams che bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The distinction of the middle class is taught in order to demonstrate the great merit.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: And that is twofold:

original: zha 'bring ba nyan thos kyi bye brag dang / zha 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: zha 'bring ba nyan thos kyi bye brag dang / zha 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag go //
translated: the distinction of the middle class of the Sravakas and the distinction of the middle class of the Bodhisattvas.

original: de la zha 'bring ba nyan thos kyi bye brag gi ni rnam pa lngas bstan te /
analyzed: de la zha 'bring ba nyan thos kyi bye brag gi ni rnam pa lngas bstan te /
translated: The distinction of the middle class of the Sravakas is taught in five ways:

original: yon tan ni chen po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yon tan ni chen po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The great qualities are called the great qualities.

original: byams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they possess the greatness of the qualities of love, etc.

original: nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni dge slong zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni dge slong zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The abandonment of the defilements is called the bhiksu.

original: nyon mongs pa bcom pas na dge slong yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bcom pas na dge slong yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is a bhiksu through the destruction of the defilements.

original: de kho na shes pa bskyed pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de kho na shes pa bskyed pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The generation of the knowledge of reality is called the Sangha.

original: chos kyi de kho na nyid mngon sum byed pas bdud la sogs pa dag gis phyed par dka' bas dge 'dun yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi de kho na nyid mngon sum byed pas bdud la sogs pa dag gis phyed par dka' bas dge 'dun yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is difficult for Māra and others to divide the community, which is the community of those who have directly perceived the reality of phenomena.

original: tshul khrims ni dge slong zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims ni dge slong zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Morality is the monk.

original: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa thob pas dge slong yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa thob pas dge slong yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because one is a monk by having obtained the vow of individual liberation.

original: de'i phyir don gyi bye brag gis dge slong lan gnyis su smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi bye brag gis dge slong lan gnyis su smos so //
translated: Therefore, the monk is mentioned twice, by the distinction of meaning.

original: grangs ni brgyad stong zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grangs ni brgyad stong zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The number is eight thousand.

original: grangs brgyad stong du nges par chad pa'o //
analyzed: grangs brgyad stong du nges par chad pa'o //
translated: The number is definitely eight thousand.

original: zha 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag ni rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
analyzed: zha 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag ni rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
translated: The middling are the bodhisattvas. The distinction of the middling is taught in three ways.

original: grangs ni rab tu mang po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grangs ni rab tu mang po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The number is very many.

original: zha 'bring pa nyan thos pas lhag pa'i phyir rab tu mang po yin no //
analyzed: zha 'bring pa nyan thos pas lhag pa'i phyir rab tu mang po yin no //
translated: Because the middling are more numerous than the hearers.

original: shes rab dang thabs dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Endowed with wisdom and means,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste /
translated: they are called bodhisattvas.

original: @12b sgra 'di gnyis ni shes rab dang thabs la bya bar don yod zhags pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @12b sgra 'di gnyis ni shes rab dang thabs la bya bar don yod zhags pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: These two terms are used in the Amoghapaśa Tantra with reference to wisdom and method.

original: stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang ldan pa ni sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang ldan pa ni sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The term “great being” refers to one who is endowed with the practice of emptiness.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med pa chen po la sems dpa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med pa chen po la sems dpa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because he is a great being in the sense that he is a great being with regard to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: yang na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su bskyab ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ste ;
analyzed: yang na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su bskyab ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ste ;
translated: Alternatively, the term “great being” refers to one who is endowed with the intention to protect the entire realm of sentient beings.

original: bsam pa che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because he is a great being in the sense that his intention is great.

original: yang na smon lam chen po dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: yang na smon lam chen po dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, the term “great being” refers to one who is endowed with the great vow.

original: sngon byang chub tu smon lam btab pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngon byang chub tu smon lam btab pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because he is a great being in the sense that he is a great being who has made the vow to attain enlightenment.

original: de bas na de dag gi bsam pa che ba'i phyir sems dpa' chen pa smos so //
analyzed: de bas na de dag gi bsam pa che ba'i phyir sems dpa' chen pa smos so //
translated: Thus, the term “great being” is used because their intention is great.

original: de ltar na rnam pa ldas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du bsgrubs te /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa ldas bdag nyid tshad ma nyid du bsgrubs te /
translated: In this way, the author establishes himself as a valid person through ten aspects.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na yang log par zhugs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na yang log par zhugs pa la /
translated: In the world, a person who is engaged in error is not a valid person.

original: dus dang yul dang bya ba la sogs pa dran par byed pas brda sprod pa snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus dang yul dang bya ba la sogs pa dran par byed pas brda sprod pa snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of the appearance of the grammarians, who are concerned with time, place, action, etc.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i dgos pa yang zhar la 'grub ste /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i dgos pa yang zhar la 'grub ste /
translated: The purpose of the teaching is also accomplished incidentally,

original: chur ba la sogs pa'i don byed pa na zho la sogs pa yang 'grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chur ba la sogs pa'i don byed pa na zho la sogs pa yang 'grub pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the purpose of making curd is accomplished incidentally when one makes butter.

original: da ni gleng gzhi brjod par bya ste /🔽gleng gzhi thub pas gsungs pa 'di //
analyzed: da ni gleng gzhi brjod par bya ste / gleng gzhi thub pas gsungs pa 'di //
translated: Now, the introduction is to be discussed.🔽The introduction is spoken by the Sage

original: de yis gdul ba'i dbang mdzad nas //
analyzed: de yis gdul ba'i dbang mdzad nas //
translated: in consideration of those to be disciplined.

original: rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste //
translated: It has five aspects

original: phongs pa rnam pa gsum du 'dod //🔽gleng gzhi des gdul ba rnams la dgongs par mdzad nas //
analyzed: phongs pa rnam pa gsum du 'dod // gleng gzhi des gdul ba rnams la dgongs par mdzad nas //
translated: and is considered to have three aims.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gleng gzhi rnam pa dang ldan pa bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gleng gzhi rnam pa dang ldan pa bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One, in consideration of those to be disciplined,🔽has spoken the introduction with five aspects.

original: gleng gzhi de ni gzungs bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gleng gzhi de ni gzungs bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The introduction is for the purpose of teaching the dhāraṇī,

original: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sku rus pa rdo rje ltar sgra ba'i sku mnga' ba yang mi rtag par yang rtogs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sku rus pa rdo rje ltar sgra ba'i sku mnga' ba yang mi rtag par yang rtogs te /
translated: because the Blessed One, who has a body with bones as hard as diamond, has also realized impermanence.

original: lhag par ches skyo ba skyes nas gzungs mnyan pa'i snod du 'gyur zhing myur du bsgrub par yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
analyzed: lhag par ches skyo ba skyes nas gzungs mnyan pa'i snod du 'gyur zhing myur du bsgrub par yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
translated: and especially, he generates great sorrow, and he becomes a vessel for listening to the dhāraṇī, and he quickly accomplishes it. Therefore, the Blessed One taught it.

original: 'jig rten na yang 'chi ba'i tshe snod du gyur pa dag kho na la zhes pa ston par byed pas de'i phyir de dang 'dra bar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid chos thams cad kyi nang na gces par ston cing gtso bo yin par yang ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang 'chi ba'i tshe snod du gyur pa dag kho na la zhes pa ston par byed pas de'i phyir de dang 'dra bar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid chos thams cad kyi nang na gces par ston cing gtso bo yin par yang ston to //
translated: And in the world, when one is dying, only those who are vessels are taught. Therefore, in the same way, this very Dharma discourse is taught as the most precious among all dharmas, and it is taught as the foremost.

original: rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Endowed with five aspects, it is as follows:

original: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Endowed with great compassion,

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: and that is taught by the Blessed One.

original: 'di ltar dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan bzhin du /
translated: Thus, while possessing the qualities of Īśvara and so forth,

original: sku tshe'i 'du byed dag 'dor bar mdzad pa ni thugs rje chen po med par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: sku tshe'i 'du byed dag 'dor bar mdzad pa ni thugs rje chen po med par mi rung ngo //
translated: it is not suitable without great compassion that he abandons the formative predispositions of his life force.

original: smon lam chen po dang ldan @13a * //
analyzed: smon lam chen po dang ldan @13a * //
translated: Endowed with great aspiration,

original: pa ni / de yang dran pa dang ldan zhing zhes pas bstan te /
analyzed: pa ni / de yang dran pa dang ldan zhing zhes pas bstan te /
translated: This is indicated by the words endowed with mindfulness.

original: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi srog yongs su btang bas kyang sems can gyi don bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo //
analyzed: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi srog yongs su btang bas kyang sems can gyi don bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo //
translated: In the past, the Lord made the vow, “Even at the cost of my life, I will work for the welfare of sentient beings.”

original: de'i phyir dran pa dang ldan bzhin du sku tshe'i 'du byed dag bor te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dran pa dang ldan bzhin du sku tshe'i 'du byed dag bor te /
translated: Therefore, endowed with mindfulness, he cast off the compositional factors of his life.

original: sngon gyi smon lam dran pas bor ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽shes rab dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam dran pas bor ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // shes rab dang ldan pa ni /
translated: The meaning is that he cast them off by remembering his former vow.

original: de yang mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de yang mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Endowed with wisdom is indicated by the words he knew.

original: 'di ltar mkhyen bzhin du sku tshe'i 'du byed dag bor ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mkhyen bzhin du sku tshe'i 'du byed dag bor ro //
translated: In this way, he knew and cast off the compositional factors of his life.

original: de ni 'di skad du ci nas gzhan gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar bor ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //🔽phongs pa'i dngos po gtong ba dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad du ci nas gzhan gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar bor ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // phongs pa'i dngos po gtong ba dang ldan pa ni /
translated: This is taught as follows: “He cast them off in such a way that the welfare of others would be accomplished.”

original: tshe'i 'du byed dag gtang bar gyur to zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: tshe'i 'du byed dag gtang bar gyur to zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Endowed with the giving of things that are difficult to give is indicated by the words he gave up the compositional factors of his life.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi phyir sku yongs su btang ba yang mdzad do snyam du 'dzin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi phyir sku yongs su btang ba yang mdzad do snyam du 'dzin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is in order to generate respect for the Lord in those who think, “He even gave up his body for our sake.”

original: phongs pa'i dngos po yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
analyzed: phongs pa'i dngos po yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
translated: The object of generosity is also shown in three ways:

original: nang gi khyad par du 'phags pa dang / mang ba dang / yongs su gtong ba'i yul gyis bstan to //
analyzed: nang gi khyad par du 'phags pa dang / mang ba dang / yongs su gtong ba'i yul gyis bstan to //
translated: by the excellence of the inner qualities, by the abundance, and by the object of the giving.

original: tshe rnams btang bar gyur to zhes bya bas kyang chog na /
analyzed: tshe rnams btang bar gyur to zhes bya bas kyang chog na /
translated: If it is said that he gave up his lives,

original: 'du byed smos pa ni tshe'i rdzas gud na med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed smos pa ni tshe'i rdzas gud na med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the mention of formative factors is in order to show that life is not a separate substance.

original: dgos pa dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: dgos pa dang ldan pa ni /
translated: The purpose is

original: de yang 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: de yang 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: shown by “and that too for the sake of…”

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das ni dgos pa mngon du gtong bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das ni dgos pa mngon du gtong bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: The Lord is shown as one who gives up his purpose.

original: dgos pa de yang rnam pa lngas bstan te /
analyzed: dgos pa de yang rnam pa lngas bstan te /
translated: That purpose is shown in five ways:

original: nye ba mngon sum gyi dngos po bstan pa dang / grangs bstan pa dang / dus bstan pa 'di gsum ni /
analyzed: nye ba mngon sum gyi dngos po bstan pa dang / grangs bstan pa dang / dus bstan pa 'di gsum ni /
translated: The teaching on the near, the direct, the things, the number, and the time, these three,

original: sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dus 'dir zad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dus 'dir zad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are taught in order to show that the time for the Buddha to ripen the beings to be trained has come to an end.

original: 'das pa bstan pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'das pa bstan pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa 'di ni /
translated: The teaching on the past and the teaching on complete nirvana,

original: sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dus med par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dus med par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are taught in order to show that the time for the Buddha to ripen the beings to be trained has come to an end.

original: gal te tshe'i 'du byed rnams btang bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te tshe'i 'du byed rnams btang bar gyur na /
translated: If the compositional factors of life are relinquished,

original: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: how are words such as these and so forth?🔽It is said:

original: smras pa / 'di dag la sogs tshig gis ni //
analyzed: smras pa / 'di dag la sogs tshig gis ni //
translated: By words such as these,

original: de dag byin gyis brlab par bstan //
analyzed: de dag byin gyis brlab par bstan //
translated: it is taught that they are blessed.

original: zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas yongs @13b su mya ngan 'da'o zhes bya pa'i tshig 'dis tshe'i 'du byed de dag byin gyis brlab par bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
analyzed: zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas yongs @13b su mya ngan 'da'o zhes bya pa'i tshig 'dis tshe'i 'du byed de dag byin gyis brlab par bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
translated: The Blessed One has demonstrated the consecration of those formative forces of life by the statement, “After these three months have passed, I will attain final Nirvana.🔽He has consecrated them out of compassion for those who are to be disciplined,

original: de ni bdud gnyis bcom pa yis //🔽gdul ba la ni thugs brtse phyir //
analyzed: de ni bdud gnyis bcom pa yis // gdul ba la ni thugs brtse phyir //
translated: having conquered the two demons.

original: 'chi bdag dang phung po'i mtshan nyid kyi bdud gnyis bcom pas gdul pa gang yin pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa de mdzad de /
analyzed: 'chi bdag dang phung po'i mtshan nyid kyi bdud gnyis bcom pas gdul pa gang yin pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa de mdzad de /
translated: He has consecrated them out of compassion for those who are to be disciplined, having conquered the two demons, i.e., the Lord of Death and the demon of the aggregates.

original: 'chi ba la dbang bar bstan pa'i phyir ni btang ngo //
analyzed: 'chi ba la dbang bar bstan pa'i phyir ni btang ngo //
translated: He has demonstrated his mastery over death by the statement, “I will attain final Nirvana.🔽He has demonstrated his mastery over the aggregates by the statement, “After these three months have passed.

original: phung po la dbang mnga' bar bstan pa'i phyir ni byin gyis brlabs te de ltar nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: phung po la dbang mnga' bar bstan pa'i phyir ni byin gyis brlabs te de ltar nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: ” This is the definite conclusion.

original: yang na 'chi bdag dang phung po gnyis las bzlog ste shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na 'chi bdag dang phung po gnyis las bzlog ste shes par bya'o //
translated: Or else, the two should be understood in the reverse order.

original: yang na lhag pa rnams ni btang la /
analyzed: yang na lhag pa rnams ni btang la /
translated: Or else, the remainder should be understood as having been relinquished,

original: zla ba gsum gyi dus tshun chad ni gzhag par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gsum gyi dus tshun chad ni gzhag par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: and the period of three months should be understood as having been fixed.

original: 'di la yang bcom ldan 'das la bdud gnyis bcom pa mnga' ste sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang bcom ldan 'das la bdud gnyis bcom pa mnga' ste sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here, too, the Lord has conquered two demons, as should be applied.

original: gdul ba'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'jug pa'i phyir /🔽sprul pa'i skus ni mya ngan las //
analyzed: gdul ba'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'jug pa'i phyir / sprul pa'i skus ni mya ngan las //
translated: Because of the variety of intentions of those to be trained,🔽the emanation body

original: 'da' bar 'dod kyi cig shos min //
analyzed: 'da' bar 'dod kyi cig shos min //
translated: is said to pass into final nirvāṇa, not the other.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mya ngan las 'da' bar ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mya ngan las 'da' bar ni mi 'dod do //
translated: The enjoyment body is not said to pass into final nirvāṇa.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gtan du gnas pa'i rgyu ldan pa //
analyzed: gtan du gnas pa'i rgyu ldan pa //
translated: Because it possesses the cause of abiding forever.

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni //
translated: The buddhas

original: mya ngan 'da' bar yang mi rigs /
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar yang mi rigs /
translated: are not suitable to pass into final nirvāṇa.

original: gtan du gnas pa'i rgyu ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yin la /
analyzed: gtan du gnas pa'i rgyu ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yin la /
translated: The cause of abiding forever is the accumulations of merit and wisdom,

original: de yang gus par bskal ba grangs med du du mar rgyun du bsgrubs pa'i phyir phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: de yang gus par bskal ba grangs med du du mar rgyun du bsgrubs pa'i phyir phul du byung ba ste /
translated: and since those are accomplished continuously for many eons with devotion, they are excellent.

original: de bas na 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the effect is similar to the cause,

original: de'i 'bras bu yang phul du byung ba yin pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mya ngan las 'da' bar ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yang phul du byung ba yin pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mya ngan las 'da' bar ga la 'gyur /
translated: Since its result is also excellent, how could the Buddha attain nirvana through the enjoyment body?

original: de lta ma yin du zin na chen po'i 'bras bu chung ngur gyur la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin du zin na chen po'i 'bras bu chung ngur gyur la /
translated: If that were not so, then a great result would become small,

original: chung ngu'i 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bas srog gcod pa spangs pa la sogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: chung ngu'i 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bas srog gcod pa spangs pa la sogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i rigs so //
translated: and a small result would become great. Therefore, it would be illogical for the result of abandoning taking life and so on to be long life and so forth.

original: gal te tshe dpag tu med pa zhig las bcom ldan 'das kyis sku tshe btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das so zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te tshe dpag tu med pa zhig las bcom ldan 'das kyis sku tshe btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das so zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the Bhagavān attained nirvana because he relinquished his immeasurable lifespan, that is not so,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //🔽yang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' pa ma rdzogs @14a * //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro // yang zhes bya ba ni dam bca' pa ma rdzogs @14a * //
translated: because it is said, “These four bases of supernormal power are to be developed,” and so on.

original: pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar mi rigs pa kho nar nges par gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar mi rigs pa kho nar nges par gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The word “also” in the root verse indicates that it is certain that it is illogical for those who have not completed their vows to attain nirvana.

original: dge ba gzhan yang dam bcas pa las 'gal bar mi byed na /
analyzed: dge ba gzhan yang dam bcas pa las 'gal bar mi byed na /
translated: Furthermore, if you do not contradict your promise to do something virtuous,🔽

original: dge ba ma lus pa'i bla mar gyur pa /
analyzed: dge ba ma lus pa'i bla mar gyur pa /
translated: Moreover, if one does not transgress one’s vow to do good,🔽how could one not be seen by the Blessed Buddhas, who are the highest good of all that is good?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta mdzad par ga la 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bdag cag gis sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs par thugs dam bcas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta mdzad par ga la 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bdag cag gis sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs par thugs dam bcas te /
translated: They have made the vow, “We will establish all sentient beings in unexcelled Awakening.”

original: de bas na ji srid du gzung bar bya ba'i sems can gcig tsam yod pa de srid du de dag mya ngan las 'da' ba ni mi rigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can med du zin kyang brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gdul ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na ji srid du gzung bar bya ba'i sems can gcig tsam yod pa de srid du de dag mya ngan las 'da' ba ni mi rigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can med du zin kyang brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gdul ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, as long as there is even one sentient being to be saved, it is not right for them to pass into Nirvana, and even if there are no sentient beings to be converted by a Buddha, there are still those to be converted by the form of Indra and so on.

original: de bas na sbrul pa'i sku kho nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod de /
analyzed: de bas na sbrul pa'i sku kho nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod de /
translated: Therefore, it is only by the Transformation Body that they are held to pass into Nirvana.

original: de ltar yang nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: And that is how it should be understood.

original: sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da' //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da' //
translated: The Buddha does not pass into Nirvana.

original: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
translated: The Dharma will not disappear.

original: sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir //
translated: In order to ripen sentient beings,

original: yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston //
translated: they display their parinirvāṇa.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: da ni 'khor rnams bsdu ba bstan te //
analyzed: da ni 'khor rnams bsdu ba bstan te //
translated: Now, the gathering of the retinue is taught.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstangs pas //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstangs pas //
translated: By the power of the perfect Buddha,

original: ma bsgrims bsgrims dang bsgrims pa yis //
analyzed: ma bsgrims bsgrims dang bsgrims pa yis //
translated: without effort, with effort, and with great effort,

original: 'phyas su 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'phyas su 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to remove arrogance,🔽the gathering is established in three ways.

original: bsdu ba rnam pa gsum du gzhag / bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba rnam pa gsum byed du bcug pa la /
analyzed: bsdu ba rnam pa gsum du gzhag / bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba rnam pa gsum byed du bcug pa la /
translated: The Blessed One caused three types of gatherings to be made:

original: ma bsgrims par bsdus pa ni mod gal gyi bu chen pos byas pa ste /
analyzed: ma bsgrims par bsdus pa ni mod gal gyi bu chen pos byas pa ste /
translated: The gathering without effort was done by Mahāmaudgalyāyana,

original: de bas na stong smos pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na stong smos pa yin te /
translated: therefore it is mentioned as a thousand.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams stong du ni nyan thos kyis kyang mngon par 'du bya mi dgos par byed nus so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams stong du ni nyan thos kyis kyang mngon par 'du bya mi dgos par byed nus so //
translated: In a thousand world systems, even the śrāvakas can gather without needing to make effort.

original: bsgrims te bsdus pa ni sh'a ri'i bus byas pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrims te bsdus pa ni sh'a ri'i bus byas pa ste /
translated: The gathering with effort was done by Śāriputra,

original: de bas na der rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya bar smos so //
analyzed: de bas na der rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya bar smos so //
translated: therefore it is mentioned as a miracle there.

original: bsgrims te bsdus pa cig shos ni /
analyzed: bsgrims te bsdus pa cig shos ni /
translated: The other, which is collected with effort,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byas pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byas pa ste /
translated: is done by the great bodhisattvas.

original: de bas na de bltas zhes smos te /
analyzed: de bas na de bltas zhes smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is seen by them.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis bskyed pa'i rtags kyis bye brag 'ga' la bltas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis bskyed pa'i rtags kyis bye brag 'ga' la bltas zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said that it is seen by some, by the signs produced by the distinctions of samadhi.

original: 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa yin te /
translated: All of this is the work of the Blessed One.

original: dang po dang tha ma ni bkas mdzad do //
analyzed: dang po dang tha ma ni bkas mdzad do //
translated: The first and last were done by his word.

original: bar ma ni mthus mdzad de /
analyzed: bar ma ni mthus mdzad de /
translated: The middle was done by his power,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis ma mdzad pa'i rnam pa @14b de med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis ma mdzad pa'i rnam pa @14b de med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the Blessed One showed that there is no aspect that he did not do.

original: bsdu ba gsum po 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa 'di yang /
analyzed: bsdu ba gsum po 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa 'di yang /
translated: This threefold collection done by the Blessed One

original: la la 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni gdul ba'i phrin las yongs su ma rdzogs par mya ngan las 'das so snyam du 'phya bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyiro //
analyzed: la la 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni gdul ba'i phrin las yongs su ma rdzogs par mya ngan las 'das so snyam du 'phya bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyiro //
translated: is also for the purpose of dispelling the scorn of some who think, The Blessed One passed into nirvana without completing the work of taming.

original: de bas na nyan thos chen po la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de bas na nyan thos chen po la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, the great disciples and so on are mentioned.

original: de lta ma yin du zin na su yang rung ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs na yang thams cad sdud nus pas nyan thos chen po la sogs pa smos ci dgos te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin du zin na su yang rung ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs na yang thams cad sdud nus pas nyan thos chen po la sogs pa smos ci dgos te /
translated: If it were otherwise, then even if the Lord blessed anyone, they would not be able to attract a following, let alone the great disciples and so on.

original: smos pas na gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu dag byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: smos pas na gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu dag byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Since it is mentioned, it shows that when the Lord blessed such people,

original: 'khor sdud pa der sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can gang 'du bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba su yang med do zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'khor sdud pa der sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i sems can gang 'du bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba su yang med do zhes ston to //
translated: there was no one who would not gather in that retinue to be tamed by the Buddha, and no one who would not be ripened.

original: de bas na gdul ba'i don yongs su rdzogs nas gdod bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
analyzed: de bas na gdul ba'i don yongs su rdzogs nas gdod bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
translated: Therefore, after the purpose of taming was completely fulfilled, the Lord passed into parinirvāṇa.

original: btsun par mi 'gyur bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: btsun par mi 'gyur bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to remove the thought that the Buddha’s teachings are not pure,

original: thub pas mngon du ma mdzad de //
analyzed: thub pas mngon du ma mdzad de //
translated: the Sage did not manifest them himself.

original: gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to generate respect,🔽he caused others to compile them.

original: gzhan dag sdud par byed du bcug / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdzad spyod mod kyi /
analyzed: gzhan dag sdud par byed du bcug / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdzad spyod mod kyi /
translated: Although the Bhagavān himself performed the deeds,

original: mi btsun par 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir gdul ba thams cad bdag nyid yis bsdu ba ma mdzad do de bas na gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mood gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa la sdud du bcug go //
analyzed: mi btsun par 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir gdul ba thams cad bdag nyid yis bsdu ba ma mdzad do de bas na gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mood gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa la sdud du bcug go //
translated: In order to remove the idea that they are not noble, the Lord did not gather in himself all the disciples. Therefore, in order to generate respect for them, the Lord caused the great Maudgalyayana and others to gather the Dharma

original: des 'dul dbang mdzad bcom ldan gyis //
analyzed: des 'dul dbang mdzad bcom ldan gyis //
translated: The Lord, the Master, has the power to gather them.

original: de gnyis mya ngan 'das par bstan //
analyzed: de gnyis mya ngan 'das par bstan //
translated: He shows the parinirvana of those two.

original: 'dir ni de gnyis smos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dir ni de gnyis smos pa'i phyir //
translated: Here, because those two are mentioned,

original: yang dag mya gnan 'das ma yin //
analyzed: yang dag mya gnan 'das ma yin //
translated: it is not the true parinirvana.

original: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / mood gal gyi bu gnyis de'i snga rol du mya ngan las 'das pas gdul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa yin gyi de gnyis la 'dir skul ba mdzad pas yang dag pa'i don
analyzed: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / mood gal gyi bu gnyis de'i snga rol du mya ngan las 'das pas gdul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa yin gyi de gnyis la 'dir skul ba mdzad pas yang dag pa'i don
translated: Because the noble Shariputra and Maudgalyayana had already entered parinirvana, the Lord, considering the disciples, showed the parinirvana of those two. But since he exhorted those two here,

original: du de gnyis mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du de gnyis mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not their true parinirvana.

original: bsdu ba gsum la sko ba dang // bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba dang // de yi 'bras bu go rims dag / bstan pa zad par 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: bsdu ba gsum la sko ba dang // bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba dang // de yi 'bras bu go rims dag / bstan pa zad par 'dod pa yin //
translated: The three kinds of assemblies are: the activity of the one who assembles, the activity of the one who is assembled, and the result of that activity, in order.

original: bsdu ba rnam pa gsum la yang mdor bsdu ba sko ba po'i bya ba dang / bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba dang / de'i 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu'i go @15a * //🔽rims bstan par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba rnam pa gsum la yang mdor bsdu ba sko ba po'i bya ba dang / bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba dang / de'i 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu'i go @15a * // rims bstan par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The three kinds of assemblies are to be understood as: the activity of the one who assembles, the activity of the one who is assembled, the result of that activity, and the order of the result.

original: de la bsdu ba dang po la sko ba po'i bya ba ni mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / bya ba la bsko ba'o //
analyzed: de la bsdu ba dang po la sko ba po'i bya ba ni mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / bya ba la bsko ba'o //
translated: The activity of the one who assembles in the first assembly is to be present and to assemble for the activity.

original: bya ba la bsko ba de la yang gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba dang / gtso bo'i bya ba dang rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: bya ba la bsko ba de la yang gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba dang / gtso bo'i bya ba dang rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: And in that activity of assembling, there are two kinds: the activity of the non-chief and the activity of the chief.

original: de yang song la zhes bya ba la sogs pas go rims bzhin bstan to //
analyzed: de yang song la zhes bya ba la sogs pas go rims bzhin bstan to //
translated: And that is taught in order by the words “having gone” and so forth.

original: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni bka' mnyam pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni bka' mnyam pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub pa ste /
translated: The activity of the one who is assembled is to be equal in speech and to accomplish that.

original: de bzhin du bsgrub pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub pa ni /
translated: To accomplish that is

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste /
translated: As soon as the Blessed One spoke, he sat on the peak of Mount Meru,

original: skad cig gis go bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis go bar byas pa'o //
translated: and in an instant, he understood.

original: skad cig de nyid la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la gsum par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / gdul ba'i dus las yol ba bsal ba'i phyir dang / gdul ba'i bya ba dag la gus par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig de nyid la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la gsum par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / gdul ba'i dus las yol ba bsal ba'i phyir dang / gdul ba'i bya ba dag la gus par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that very instant is said because it shows the Blessed One's swiftness in teaching, because it removes the delay in the time for taming, and because it shows respect for the activities of taming.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par bstan par yang mngon no //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par bstan par yang mngon no //
translated: It is also evident that he is shown to possess effortless magical power.

original: 'di ni 'dug pa dang go bar byed pa gnyis ka la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dug pa dang go bar byed pa gnyis ka la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied to both sitting and understanding.

original: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs smos pa yang gnyis ka dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs smos pa yang gnyis ka dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The mention of his own magical power should also be applied to both.

original: ri rab kyi rtse mo smos pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed pa 'di gnyis ni che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ri rab kyi rtse mo smos pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed pa 'di gnyis ni che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The mention of the peak of Mount Meru and the understanding throughout the trichiliocosm are both for the sake of showing greatness.

original: 'dis ni gang na 'di lta bu'i sdud pa po yod pa der ni sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba su yang mi 'dul ba med par bstan to //🔽go bar byed pa yang don rnam pa brgyad dang ldan te gus par nyams su len du gzhug pa'i phyir mngon du phyogs par bya ba'i don dang / rjes su chags pa la sogs pa med par shes par bya ba'i phyir mtha' dag gi don dang /🔽bka' dang mthun pa'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhi'i don dang / de kho na rtogs pa dag slob mar gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gang na 'di lta bu'i sdud pa po yod pa der ni sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba su yang mi 'dul ba med par bstan to // go bar byed pa yang don rnam pa brgyad dang ldan te gus par nyams su len du gzhug pa'i phyir mngon du phyogs par bya ba'i don dang / rjes su chags pa la sogs pa med par shes par bya ba'i phyir mtha' dag gi don dang / bka' dang mthun pa'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhi'i don dang / de kho na rtogs pa dag slob mar gyur te /
translated: This shows that wherever there is such a compiler, there is no disciple of the Buddha who is not disciplined.🔽The explainer has eight topics: the topic of direct engagement in order to engage in respectful practice, the topic of the whole in order to understand the absence of attachment and so on,🔽the topic of the basis in order to accomplish the meaning in accordance with the scriptures, the topic of the meaning of the Dharma in order to teach the greatness of the Dharma, the topic of the meaning of the Dharma in order to benefit those who have realized reality,

original: de lta bu dag la yang phan 'dogs pas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i don dang / bskul ba la sogs pa'i ma longs pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir 'jug par bya ba'i don dang /
analyzed: de lta bu dag la yang phan 'dogs pas chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i don dang / bskul ba la sogs pa'i ma longs pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir 'jug par bya ba'i don dang /
translated: the topic of the meaning of engagement in order to demonstrate the greatness of the Dharma through benefiting such beings, the topic of the meaning of the whole in order to demonstrate the absence of incomplete exhortation and so on, and the topic of the meaning of the basis in order to demonstrate the absence of incomplete practice.

original: de dag nyid la chos bstan pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos 'dod pa'i don dang / rang gi don rab tu bstan pas de dag gi spro ba bskyad pa'i phyir 'bras bu nyu bar bstan pa'i don dang / bsgrims pa med par 'dul bar @15b bstan pa'i phyir rang dbang yod par bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dag nyid la chos bstan pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos 'dod pa'i don dang / rang gi don rab tu bstan pas de dag gi spro ba bskyad pa'i phyir 'bras bu nyu bar bstan pa'i don dang / bsgrims pa med par 'dul bar @15b bstan pa'i phyir rang dbang yod par bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the desire for the Dharma is to benefit them by teaching the Dharma to them. The meaning of the teaching of the result is to increase their enthusiasm by demonstrating one's own goal. The meaning of the teaching of independence is to demonstrate the training without exertion.

original: de gnyis kyi 'bras bu yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi 'bras bu yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
translated: The result of those two is also demonstrated in three ways:

original: grangs dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ldan pa dang 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: grangs dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ldan pa dang 'dus pa'o //
translated: the number, the possession of the abandonment of the afflictions, and the assembly.

original: de'i go rims kyang rnam pa bzhis bstan te /
analyzed: de'i go rims kyang rnam pa bzhis bstan te /
translated: The order of those is also demonstrated in four ways:

original: mthong ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba byed pa dang / 'khod pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba byed pa dang / 'khod pa'o //
translated: seeing, bowing, circumambulating, and sitting.

original: de dag kyang dngos pos go rims su gyur par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang dngos pos go rims su gyur par rig par bya ste /
translated: Those should be understood in order by means of the entities.

original: lhags pa'i 'og tu thog ma kho nar mthong ngo //
analyzed: lhags pa'i 'og tu thog ma kho nar mthong ngo //
translated: After arriving, first they see.

original: de nas mthong bas lus tshim par gyur nas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de nas mthong bas lus tshim par gyur nas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Then, after their bodies are satisfied by seeing, they bow.

original: de nas dad pa'i shugs mngon par 'phel nas bskor bar byed do //
analyzed: de nas dad pa'i shugs mngon par 'phel nas bskor bar byed do //
translated: Then, with the power of faith greatly increased, he circumambulates.

original: de nas go rims bzhin byas nas gong gi phyir lhags pa de'i phyir 'khod do //
analyzed: de nas go rims bzhin byas nas gong gi phyir lhags pa de'i phyir 'khod do //
translated: Then, having done as instructed, he sits down in front of the one who came before.

original: bsdu ba gnyis pa la sko ba po'i bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu ste /
analyzed: bsdu ba gnyis pa la sko ba po'i bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu ste /
translated: In the second collection, the action of the one who appoints is the power of the Buddha.

original: mthu ni dbang yin no //
analyzed: mthu ni dbang yin no //
translated: Power is mastery.

original: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni thabs dpyod pa dang / de'i 'bras bu dpyod pa dang / thabs sgrub pa dang / de'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni thabs dpyod pa dang / de'i 'bras bu dpyod pa dang / thabs sgrub pa dang / de'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa ste /
translated: The action of the one who is appointed is the analysis of the means, the analysis of the result of that, the accomplishment of the means, and the accomplishment of its result.

original: rtog pa mngon du gtong ba ni thabs dang de'i 'bras bu dpyad nas de bsgrubs pas 'bras bu 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: rtog pa mngon du gtong ba ni thabs dang de'i 'bras bu dpyad nas de bsgrubs pas 'bras bu 'grub par byed do //
translated: The presentation of the analysis is the means and its result. Having analyzed that, the accomplishment of the means and its result is the accomplishment of the result.

original: de bas na de dag go rims ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de dag go rims ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, their order is like that.

original: 'bras bu dpyod pa yang rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu dpyod pa yang rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: The analysis of the result is also fivefold:

original: mtha' dag pa dag dang gzhi dang / gdul ba dang / de'i rab tu dbye ba dang / rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: mtha' dag pa dag dang gzhi dang / gdul ba dang / de'i rab tu dbye ba dang / rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: the complete, the basis, the discipline, its division, and its essence.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa can la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa can la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because it mentions those who belong to the Disciple Vehicle, etc.

original: byang chub mchog gi rigs yin la //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi rigs yin la //
translated: They belong to the family of the supreme enlightenment.

original: blo zhan bshes gnyen dman bsten pas //
analyzed: blo zhan bshes gnyen dman bsten pas //
translated: But because they are weak-minded and rely on an inferior spiritual teacher,

original: gang dag dman pa'i lam bsten pa //
analyzed: gang dag dman pa'i lam bsten pa //
translated: those who follow the inferior path

original: de dag 'dir bkug shes par bya ste de lta ma yin na chos bstan pa 'di dag la phan med pas de dag bkug pas ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: de dag 'dir bkug shes par bya ste de lta ma yin na chos bstan pa 'di dag la phan med pas de dag bkug pas ci zhig bya ste /
translated: should be drawn into this teaching. Otherwise, since this teaching of the Dharma would be useless for them, what would be the point of drawing them in?

original: mdo rdzogs kyi bar du yang gzhan nas ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du /
analyzed: mdo rdzogs kyi bar du yang gzhan nas ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du /
translated: And so on up to the end of the sutra, as it occurs elsewhere.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyis 'bras bu ni ci yang ma bstan la /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyis 'bras bu ni ci yang ma bstan la /
translated: Those who belong to the Disciple Vehicle are not taught any result.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin no //
translated: But the teaching of the Dharma by the Lord is not without result.

original: de lta bas na de dag la yang de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yod par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag la yang de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yod par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that even for them at that time there is a result, such as being established in the stage of nonregression.

original: de bas na de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs can kho na yin pa las /
analyzed: de bas na de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs can kho na yin pa las /
translated: Thus, they belong only to the family of the Buddhas.

original: ci zhig ltar gyur te /
analyzed: ci zhig ltar gyur te /
translated: What is it that has happened?

original: theg pa gzhan la zhugs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa gzhan la zhugs par shes par bya'o //
translated: It is to be understood that they have entered another vehicle.

original: 'bras bu de'i go rims kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu de'i go rims kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The order of the results is also fourfold,

original: snga ma bzhin @16a * //🔽du nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin @16a * // du nges par gzung ngo //
translated: as before.

original: bsdu ba gsum pa la sko ba po'i bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsdu ba gsum pa la sko ba po'i bya ba ni /
translated: The third collection is the activity of the one who is appointed.

original: mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / bya ba la sko ba'o //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / bya ba la sko ba'o //
translated: It is the activity of appointment and the activity of the one who is appointed.

original: de dag rnam pa bzhi dag gis /
analyzed: de dag rnam pa bzhi dag gis /
translated: The activity of the one who is appointed is fourfold.

original: mngon du phyogs par mdzad pa na //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs par mdzad pa na //
translated: The Victor has taught that the one who is appointed

original: bsdu ba'i mtha' dag nyid dang ni //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i mtha' dag nyid dang ni //
translated: is the one who is intent on the whole collection

original: chen po nyid kyang rgyal bas bstan //
analyzed: chen po nyid kyang rgyal bas bstan //
translated: and on the great.

original: mngon du phyogs par bya ba yang rnam pa bzhi ste /🔽ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni /🔽mthong ba don yod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: mngon du phyogs par bya ba yang rnam pa bzhi ste / ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni / mthong ba don yod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The one who is intent is fourfold.🔽The one who has attained concentration is the bodhisattva who is called “the one whose seeing is fruitful,”🔽because he has attained the concentration called “the one whose seeing is fruitful.”

original: de thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i 'bras bu thob pa ni /
analyzed: de thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i 'bras bu thob pa ni /
translated: The one who has attained the result of that concentration is the bodhisattva who is called “the one whose seeing is fruitful,”

original: ting nge 'dzin 'ga' zhig 'bras bu mthong ba don yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'ga' zhig 'bras bu mthong ba don yod pa nyid de /
translated: Some meditative stabilizations are fruitful, because they are the cause of seeing the truth.🔽In order to attain that, it is said, “seeing is fruitful.”

original: de thob pa'i phyir mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / smon lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa ni //
analyzed: de thob pa'i phyir mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / smon lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa ni //
translated: The attainment of the result of a vow is

original: sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to attain the result of a former vow.🔽In order to see that, it is said, “seeing is fruitful.”🔽The attainment of the result of the practice of virtue is

original: mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / yon tan bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa des gang gis mthong ba don yod par gyur pa de lta bu'i yon tan bsgrubs pas na de'i phyir mthong ba don yod gsungs pa'o //🔽de'i mthong ba don yod pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mthong ba don yod ces gsungs pa dang / yon tan bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa des gang gis mthong ba don yod par gyur pa de lta bu'i yon tan bsgrubs pas na de'i phyir mthong ba don yod gsungs pa'o // de'i mthong ba don yod pa nyid ni /
translated: because of the practice of the virtues that make seeing fruitful.🔽That seeing is fruitful

original: de mthong ba 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mthong ba 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not become fruitless.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it should be applied to all bodhisattvas.

original: rnam pa 'di dag gis bsdu ba'i mtha' dag nyid dang / chen po nyid bstan te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag gis bsdu ba'i mtha' dag nyid dang / chen po nyid bstan te /
translated: By these aspects, the totality and greatness of the collections is shown,

original: sdud pa po rnams che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdud pa po rnams che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the collectors are great.

original: bya ba la bsko ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bya ba la bsko ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The activity of the bodhisattva is twofold:

original: gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba dang / gtso bo'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba dang / gtso bo'i bya ba'o //
translated: the activity that is not preeminent and the activity that is preeminent.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba yang rang gi ngo bo dang / yul gyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa'i bya ba yang rang gi ngo bo dang / yul gyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
