translated: The activity that is not preeminent is twofold: by nature and by realm.

original: yul ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yul ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: By realm, it is said to be in all the buddha lands.

original: de phan chad nas sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de phan chad nas sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there are no more disciples to be trained by the Buddha beyond that.

original: gtso bo'i bya ba ni mtha' dag dang / gdul ba'i rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i dbye ba dang / gzhi dang / rang gi ngo bos bstan te /
analyzed: gtso bo'i bya ba ni mtha' dag dang / gdul ba'i rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i dbye ba dang / gzhi dang / rang gi ngo bos bstan te /
translated: The activity that is preeminent is taught by the totality, by the nature of the disciples, by their classification, by the basis, and by its nature.

original: de'i gdul ba'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i gdul ba'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: The nature of the disciples is taught.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there are no other disciples of the Buddha such as sravakas and so on.

original: de'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: Their classification is taught.

original: de snyed cig gi dbye bas tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bkug pa'o //
analyzed: de snyed cig gi dbye bas tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bkug pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas who are differentiated by that many classifications are summoned.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag dgug pa la shin tu dka' ba ci zhig yod na ma bkug par zhe na /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag dgug pa la shin tu dka' ba ci zhig yod na ma bkug par zhe na /
translated: What is so difficult about summoning those who are śrāvakas, etc.?

original: de'i @16b phyir de dag la des gdul ba med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i @16b phyir de dag la des gdul ba med par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that they are not to be disciplined by him,

original: srid pa tha ma pa ni tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa tha ma pa ni tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o //
translated: one who is in his final existence is one who becomes fully enlightened in this very life.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni tshe phyi ma la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni tshe phyi ma la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o //
translated: One who is impeded by a single birth is one who becomes fully enlightened in a subsequent life.

original: phyir mi ldog pa ni sa brgyad pa thob pa rnams so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa ni sa brgyad pa thob pa rnams so //
translated: One who is irreversible is one who has attained the eighth stage.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa rnams so //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa rnams so //
translated: One who has attained receptivity to the non-arising of things is one who has attained the stages of joy, etc.

original: dad pas mos pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa thob pa rnams so //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa thob pa rnams so //
translated: One who is devoted through faith is one who has attained the stage of action out of faith.

original: srid pa tha ma pa smos pa ni chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: srid pa tha ma pa smos pa ni chos kyi rnam grangs kyi che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The mention of one who is in his final existence is for the purpose of demonstrating the greatness of this Dharma teaching.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa rnams la yang phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa rnams la yang phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also helpful to those who have completed the accumulations of merit and knowledge.

original: bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan yin la /
analyzed: bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan yin la /
translated: The word “collection” is different from the word “to collect.”

original: de yang bsdu bar bya ba'i bya ba brjod par 'dod na rung ste /
analyzed: de yang bsdu bar bya ba'i bya ba brjod par 'dod na rung ste /
translated: And it is appropriate to speak of the activity of collecting in terms of what is to be collected.

original: de lta na bsgrims te bsdu ba 'di ji ltar rung zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na bsgrims te bsdu ba 'di ji ltar rung zhe na /
translated: But how can it be appropriate to speak of “collecting with effort” in this context?🔽There is no fault here.🔽The word “collection” is used in the world in two ways:

original: nyes pa med de 'di ltar gang zhig bsgrims te bsdu ba dang / gang yang bsgrims ni mi dgos pa //🔽brjod par 'dod pa 'di la 'di //🔽'jin  rten spyod pa'i tshul gyis 'jug / bya ba ma sbyar du zin kyang nus pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis sgra 'di 'jig rten na sbyor te /
analyzed: nyes pa med de 'di ltar gang zhig bsgrims te bsdu ba dang / gang yang bsgrims ni mi dgos pa // brjod par 'dod pa 'di la 'di // 'jin  rten spyod pa'i tshul gyis 'jug / bya ba ma sbyar du zin kyang nus pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis sgra 'di 'jig rten na sbyor te /
translated: with reference to that which is collected with effort and that which is collected without effort.

original: tshong ba'i grong nan gyis sdus shig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang 'dra bas na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: tshong ba'i grong nan gyis sdus shig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang 'dra bas na nyes pa med do //
translated: Even though the activity of collecting is not applied in this context, the word “collection” is used in the world by the power of seeing the capacity for collecting, just as in the expressions “collect the merchants” and “collect the city.”

original: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsko bar bya ba'i bya ba ni /
translated: The activity of being appointed is

original: bka' mnyan pa dang / de bzhin du bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bka' mnyan pa dang / de bzhin du bsgrub pa'o //
translated: to obey and to act accordingly.

original: de'i 'bras bu dang / de'i go rims kyi don ni phal cher gong du thal bas rnam par mi phye'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu dang / de'i go rims kyi don ni phal cher gong du thal bas rnam par mi phye'o //
translated: The result of that, and the meaning of the order of that, for the most part, is not distinguished by the above.

original: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word good here means I understand it like this.

original: brjod du med pa ni grangs kyi bye brag yin te /
analyzed: brjod du med pa ni grangs kyi bye brag yin te /
translated: The inexpressible is a specific number.

original: des kyang brjod du med pa'o //🔽yang na brjod du med pa'i yang /
analyzed: des kyang brjod du med pa'o // yang na brjod du med pa'i yang /
translated: By that, it is also inexpressible.🔽Or, the inexpressible of the inexpressible

original: brjod du med pa nyid grangs kyi bye brag yin te /
analyzed: brjod du med pa nyid grangs kyi bye brag yin te /
translated: is itself a specific number.

original: brgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: brgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Like hundred and so on.

original: de yang bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye brag yin no //
analyzed: de yang bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye brag yin no //
translated: That is also a specific number of a hundred thousand.

original: da ni dgos pa brtags nas phan pa che ba dang / gdul ba'i bye brag dang / gus pa'i bye brag dang / ston pa po'i bye brag dang / dgos pa'i bye brag dang / rnam pa lngas zhu ba bstan to //
analyzed: da ni dgos pa brtags nas phan pa che ba dang / gdul ba'i bye brag dang / gus pa'i bye brag dang / ston pa po'i bye brag dang / dgos pa'i bye brag dang / rnam pa lngas zhu ba bstan to //
translated: Now, having examined the purpose, the request is shown by five distinctions: great benefit, distinction of disciples, distinction of respect, distinction of teachers, and distinction of purpose.

original: ston pa po ni bye brag rnam pa gsum gyis khyad par du 'phags te /
analyzed: ston pa po ni bye brag rnam pa gsum gyis khyad par du 'phags te /
translated: The teacher is superior by three distinctions:

original: gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni //
analyzed: gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni //
translated: Because the Tathāgata

original: skyon dang nyon mongs phung po bstsal //🔽don kun @17a * //
analyzed: skyon dang nyon mongs phung po bstsal // don kun @17a * //
translated: has eliminated faults, afflictions, and the aggregates,🔽and

original: yang dag mkhyen pa ste //
analyzed: yang dag mkhyen pa ste //
translated: has thoroughly known all objects,

original: de phyir rgyal la zhu bar 'os //
analyzed: de phyir rgyal la zhu bar 'os //
translated: it is fitting to ask the Victor.

original: gang gi phyir phyin ci ma log par gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyin ci ma log par gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: Because he has taught without error, he is the Tathāgata.

original: de'i phyir zhu bar 'os te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhu bar 'os te /
translated: Therefore, it is fitting to ask him.

original: de yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, because he has abandoned the afflictive and cognitive obstructions.

original: de'i de yang don thams cad yang dag par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i de yang don thams cad yang dag par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because he has thoroughly known all objects.

original: yang na gang gi phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa de'i phyir zhu bar 'os te /
analyzed: yang na gang gi phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa de'i phyir zhu bar 'os te /
translated: Or, because he is a perfect buddha, it is fitting to ask him.

original: de'i de yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i de yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because he has abandoned the afflictive and cognitive obstructions.

original: de'i de yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i de yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: And that is because he is a Tathāgata.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bgrod pa dang / rjes su bgrod pa'i lam du gshegs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bgrod pa dang / rjes su bgrod pa'i lam du gshegs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it is the path traversed and followed by the Well-Gone Ones.

original: dad pas mos pa la sogs pas //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa la sogs pas //
translated: By those who are devoted, etc.🔽,

original: gong nas gong du 'thob pa'i phyir //🔽gdul bya'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: gong nas gong du 'thob pa'i phyir // gdul bya'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis //
translated: the attainment of the stages is progressively higher.

original: don ni rnam lngar bstan pa yin //
analyzed: don ni rnam lngar bstan pa yin //
translated: The meaning is taught as fivefold🔽by the distinctions of the inclinations of those to be taught.

original: dgos pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: dgos pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five kinds of aims:

original: dad pas mos pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa dang / de rnams kyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa nyid 'thob pa dang /
analyzed: dad pas mos pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa dang / de rnams kyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa nyid 'thob pa dang /
translated: those who are devoted attain receptivity to the non-arising of things; those who have attained receptivity to the non-arising of things attain the irreversible stage; those attain the state of being tied to one more birth;

original: de rnams kyis kyang srid pa tha ma pa nyid 'thob pa dang / srid pa tha ma ba rnams kyis kyang gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang srid pa tha ma pa nyid 'thob pa dang / srid pa tha ma ba rnams kyis kyang gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa 'thob pa'o //
translated: those attain the state of being in their last existence; and those in their last existence attain entry into the door of retention.

original: sdug bsngal la sogs yul rnams la //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs yul rnams la //
translated: With regard to the objects of suffering, etc.

original: ner nur byed pa som nyid bstan //🔽de spangs sa thob 'di yin par //
analyzed: ner nur byed pa som nyid bstan // de spangs sa thob 'di yin par //
translated: Hesitation is taught as wavering.

original: 'dir ni don gyis bstan pa yin //🔽don gyis na sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i the tshom spangs na /
analyzed: 'dir ni don gyis bstan pa yin // don gyis na sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i the tshom spangs na /
translated: Here, the meaning is taught by implication:🔽“Having abandoned hesitation, one attains the stages.”

original: dad pas mos pa rnams kyis sa thob par bstan to //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa rnams kyis sa thob par bstan to //
translated: By implication, it is taught that those who aspire through faith, having abandoned hesitation regarding the truths of suffering, etc., attain the stages.

original: som nyi spangs pas sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyang spangs par khong du chud par bya ste /

original: de dag ni cig car spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni cig car spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

original: thams cad ces smos pa ni bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i som nyi bsdu ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: thams cad ces smos pa ni bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i som nyi bsdu ba'i phyir ram /

analyzed: chung ngu la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa bsdu ba'i phyir ro //

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni 'dir //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni 'dir //

original: rnam pa gnyis kyis 'thob par bstan //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis kyis 'thob par bstan //

original: sa dang po thob pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyis ni rang gi stobs dang gzhan gyis stobs rnam pa gnyis kyis phyir mi ldog @17b pa'i sa thob par bstan to //
analyzed: sa dang po thob pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyis ni rang gi stobs dang gzhan gyis stobs rnam pa gnyis kyis phyir mi ldog @17b pa'i sa thob par bstan to //
translated: Those who have attained the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas through attaining the first ground have attained the irreversible ground through both their own power and the power of others.

original: sgrib pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir te /
translated: The unobstructed refers to the abandonment of the afflictive and cognitive obstructions.

original: ye shes dang spobs pa gang la yod pa de'i ngo bo ni zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: ye shes dang spobs pa gang la yod pa de'i ngo bo ni zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //

original: yang na sgrib pa med pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: yang na sgrib pa med pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /

original: 'dis snang bar byed pas de'i ngo bo nyid de yin pas yang nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis snang bar byed pas de'i ngo bo nyid de yin pas yang nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: It is the essence of that because it illuminates with that. Therefore, it should be ascertained again.

original: 'dis mi g-yos pa'i sa bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis mi g-yos pa'i sa bstan te /
translated: This teaches the immovable ground.

original: de ni rang gi stobs yin no //
analyzed: de ni rang gi stobs yin no //
translated: That is one's own power.

original: gzhan gyi stobs ni rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi stobs ni rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma la brten pas /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma la brten pas /
translated: Relying on many spiritual friends.

original: thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: The attainment of the knowledge that arises from hearing, the attainment of the knowledge that arises from reflection, and the attainment of the knowledge that arises from meditation.

original: des dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will not forget mindfulness.

original: yang na chos bstan pa nyan pa dang / de'i don 'dzin pa dang / dus gzhan na mi brjed pa dang / de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog la brten nas /

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pas phyir mi ldog par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pas phyir mi ldog par bstan pa'i phyir /

original: bar du zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so //
analyzed: bar du zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so //

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs rnams kyis //

original: sa ni rten bzhis thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa ni rten bzhis thob par 'gyur //
translated: attain the stage by four supports.

original: phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis ni rnam pa bzhis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis ni rnam pa bzhis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Those who are irreversible attain the stage obstructed by one birth by four aspects.

original: spyod pa sbyin sogs pha rol phyin //
analyzed: spyod pa sbyin sogs pha rol phyin //
translated: The conduct is the perfections such as generosity.

original: tshogs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: tshogs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //

original: gsum ni bsod nams pha rol phyin //
analyzed: gsum ni bsod nams pha rol phyin //

original: lhag ma ye shes cig shos gnyis //
analyzed: lhag ma ye shes cig shos gnyis //

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //

original: bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
translated: The other three perfections concentration, wisdom, and means are the wisdom accumulation.

original: brtson 'grus ni gnyi ga ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni gnyi ga ste /

original: gnyi gar bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: des gdul phyir ni gnas pa dang // bstan pa don yod mtshungs pa med //

analyzed: smon lam 'bras bu 'grub pa dang // dga' mgur zhing ni ston par byed //

analyzed: smon lam gyis bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpas gdul ba nyid du sems can rnams @18a * //

original: gnas pa ni sems can yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni sems can yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: mdo sde la sogs pa chos bstan pa don yod cing mtshungs pa med pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pas na chos yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: smon lam ma lus par 'bras bur 'grub pas na smon lam yongs su dag pa'o //

original: yang na / sems can la sogs rnam dag ni //
analyzed: yang na / sems can la sogs rnam dag ni //
translated: The purification of sentient beings and so on

original: sems can chos don gnyer dang zhing //
analyzed: sems can chos don gnyer dang zhing //

original: rang bzhin bdag med mthong ba yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin bdag med mthong ba yin //

original: de ni 'dod pa'i don grub byed //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa'i don grub byed //

analyzed: 'dis yongs su dag par 'gyur bas na yongs su dag pa ste yongs su dag pa bzhi ni /
translated: Since these are purified, they are purities. The four purities are

analyzed: lus sogs yid du 'ong bar gnas // thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis //

analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid de dag ni gdul ba'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis dus gcig tu gnas na yang de dag yid du 'ong ste /

original: yang gi sgra ni /

translated: The skill in the faculties of faith, etc. is the entrance into the dhāraṇī-door, which is a special collection of words, as before.

analyzed: dbang po la mkhas pa ni chung ngu la sogs pa'i bye brag dang / yongs su smin pa'i dus la sogs pa'i bye brag la spyod pa'o //
translated: The skill in the faculties is the practice of the distinctions of weak, etc. and the distinctions of the time of complete maturation, etc.

analyzed: 'di la 'du byed pa med pas na las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o //

analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid yin par gzung bar bya'o //

original: du byas na ni /
analyzed: du byas na ni /
translated: Thus, if one is governed by faith and devotion,

original: 'di dag thams cad yod par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad yod par blta bar bya'o //
translated: all this should be seen as existent.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i dbang du byas na ni som nyi thams cad spong ba ma gtogs par /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i dbang du byas na ni som nyi thams cad spong ba ma gtogs par /
translated: In terms of attaining the acceptance that phenomena are unborn, one eliminates all doubts except for the following two.

original: zhu ba lhag ma rnams yod par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhu ba lhag ma rnams yod par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: If one considers the acceptance of the nonarising of all things, one should understand that all the remaining questions are definitely present, with the exception of the abandonment of all doubts.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par bya'o //
translated: And so it is for other bodhisattvas, as is appropriate.

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba mkhyen par gsol ba ston te /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba mkhyen par gsol ba ston te /
translated: Now, in order to show the request to the Lord, it is said:

original: zhu ba'i 'bras bu blo ldan gyis //
analyzed: zhu ba'i 'bras bu blo ldan gyis //
translated: The wise one has declared the result of the request

original: zhu ba nyid du rab tu gsungs //
analyzed: zhu ba nyid du rab tu gsungs //
translated: to be the request itself.

original: yang na 'bras dang tha dad pas //
analyzed: yang na 'bras dang tha dad pas //
translated: Or, because it is different from the result,

original: sgro btags zhu ba nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: sgro btags zhu ba nyid du gsungs //
translated: the request is declared to be the result.

original: zhu ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus zhu ba'i dngos po'i 'bras bu gang yin pa som nyi thams cad spong ba la sogs pa de yin par gsungs te /
analyzed: zhu ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus zhu ba'i dngos po'i 'bras bu gang yin pa som nyi thams cad spong ba la sogs pa de yin par gsungs te /
translated: The word request is said to be the result of the request by the noble Shariputra, which is the abandonment of all doubts and so forth.

original: 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa ste /
translated: The cause is designated as the result.

original: mjug gi 'bras bu'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mjug gi 'bras bu'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the word result is not expressed.

original: de lta ma yin du zin na zhu ba'i rang gi ngo bo nges par ma byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ma yin du zin na zhu ba'i rang gi ngo bo nges par ma byas pa'i phyir /
translated: If that were not so, then the nature of the melted state would not be ascertained.

original: de dag ces bya ba'i sgra dang sbyor bar byed pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba'i sgra dang sbyor bar byed pa mi rigs te /
translated: If that were not so, then it would be unreasonable to apply the word “those” because the nature of the request would not be ascertained.

original: de ltar na zhu ba de dag la zhu ba'i 'bras bu de dag ces bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhu ba de dag la zhu ba'i 'bras bu de dag ces bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the meaning of “those” should be understood as the results of the request in regard to those requests.

original: ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo yin no //
translated: “As stated” refers to the nature of the request.

original: gzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum ni /
analyzed: gzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum ni /
translated: The three phrases beginning with “grasping” refer to:

original: tshig 'bru dang / don dang / gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: tshig 'bru dang / don dang / gnyi ga'o //
translated: the letter, the meaning, and both.

original: yang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i theg pa can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i theg pa can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Alternatively, they are for the sake of benefiting those who belong to the vehicles of the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and the Great Vehicle.

original: bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i don 'grub pa'i phyir yang brjod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i don 'grub pa'i phyir yang brjod par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that they are also stated for the sake of accomplishing the aims of oneself, others, and both.

original: yang na rang gi ngo bo dang / rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis ni gzung ngo //
analyzed: yang na rang gi ngo bo dang / rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis ni gzung ngo //
translated: Alternatively, they are grasped by means of both the nature and the classification.

original: so so rang gis rig par spyad pas ni yid la byas so //
analyzed: so so rang gis rig par spyad pas ni yid la byas so //
translated: They are mentally attended to by means of the practice of individual correct knowledge.

original: tshad ma thams cad kyis rnam par dag pas ni kun chub par bya so //
analyzed: tshad ma thams cad kyis rnam par dag pas ni kun chub par bya so //
translated: Since it is purified by all valid cognitions, it is to be fully understood.

original: rnam pa gzhan yang ji skad smos pa'i 'bras bu'i bye brag gis zhu ba'i rang gi ngo bo dmigs kyis ma phye ba dmigs kyis phye nas /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yang ji skad smos pa'i 'bras bu'i bye brag gis zhu ba'i rang gi ngo bo dmigs kyis ma phye ba dmigs kyis phye nas /
translated: Moreover, the nature of the request, which is not specified by the particular results mentioned, is specified by the particular results.

original: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod de ji skad smos pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod de ji skad smos pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The words those and so on are stated. The meaning is the particular results mentioned.

original: gzung ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum gyi bshad pa 'dir ni bshad pa bar ma gnyis la ltos par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum gyi bshad pa 'dir ni bshad pa bar ma gnyis la ltos par shes par bya'o //
translated: In this explanation of the three phrases beginning with apprehended, the two middle explanations should be understood to be dependent.

original: de ltar zhu ba mkhyen bar gsol ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar zhu ba mkhyen bar gsol ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus requested the Bhagavān to teach,

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs te /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs te /
translated: now he makes a request to the Bhagavān.🔽The three purities are:🔽the purity of words, meanings, and both,🔽the purity of the distinctions of hearing and so on,

original: tshig dang don @19b dang gnyi ga dang // thos sogs shes pa'i bye brag dang // mngon sum ma rjes dpag rnam gnyis kyis //🔽rnam par dag pa rnams gsum mo //
analyzed: tshig dang don @19b dang gnyi ga dang // thos sogs shes pa'i bye brag dang // mngon sum ma rjes dpag rnam gnyis kyis // rnam par dag pa rnams gsum mo //
translated: and the purity of direct perception and inference.

original: gzung ba dang / yid la byas pa dang / kun chub par byas pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gzung ba dang / yid la byas pa dang / kun chub par byas pa rnams ni /
translated: The purity of the apprehended, the mentally engaged, and the fully understood refers to the three purities.

original: tshig dang / don dang / gnyi ga'am /🔽thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i shes pas /
analyzed: tshig dang / don dang / gnyi ga'am / thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i shes pas /
translated: meaning, and both.

original: yongs su bcad pa'am /
analyzed: yongs su bcad pa'am /
translated: It is discerned by the knowledge that comes from hearing, reflection, and meditation.🔽It is discerned by direct perception, inference, and both valid cognitions.

original: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma gnyi gas rnam par dag pa las rnam pa gsum du go rims bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma gnyi gas rnam par dag pa las rnam pa gsum du go rims bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood in three ways, in order.

original: de la bshad pa dang po la zhu ba'i 'bras bu ni zhu ba'i sgras brjod do zhes bstan te /
analyzed: de la bshad pa dang po la zhu ba'i 'bras bu ni zhu ba'i sgras brjod do zhes bstan te /
translated: In the first explanation, the result of the question is expressed by the word “question.”

original: de ltar na 'di skad du gang gis zhu ba'i 'bras bu 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / de las thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pas bsdus pas spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di skad du gang gis zhu ba'i 'bras bu 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / de las thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pas bsdus pas spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thus, it means, “Please explain to us, Blessed One, that kind of question by which this result of the question is accomplished, and by which, through the knowledge that comes from hearing and so on, one’s conduct becomes pure.”

original: bshad pa gnyis pa la ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba ni ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: bshad pa gnyis pa la ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba ni ji skad smos pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: In the second explanation, “as stated” means that the result as stated should be understood.

original: de ltar na 'di skad du zhu ba gang las 'bras bu 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pas bsdus pas spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di skad du zhu ba gang las 'bras bu 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pas bsdus pas spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thus, this is the meaning of the request: “The Bhagavān should explain the kind of conduct that results in the accomplishment of this goal and the purification of the conduct that is included in the knowledge of hearing and so on.🔽”

original: de nas spyod pa de ni gang yin //
analyzed: de nas spyod pa de ni gang yin //
translated: What is that conduct?

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni ji lta bu //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni ji lta bu //
translated: What is its purification?

original: de'i 'bras bu ni ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What result is attained from it?🔽It was said:

original: smras pa / spyod pa pha rol phyin pa bcu //🔽yang na stong nyid de yi ni //
analyzed: smras pa / spyod pa pha rol phyin pa bcu // yang na stong nyid de yi ni //
translated: “The conduct is the ten perfections.

original: rnam dag skyon med sa thob pas //
analyzed: rnam dag skyon med sa thob pas //
translated: Or, the attainment of the faultless stage of emptiness

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob //
translated: is the attainment of the state of omniscience.🔽”

original: spyod pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
analyzed: spyod pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste /
translated: The conduct is the ten perfections, such as generosity,

original: spyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are what is to be practiced.

original: yang na stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: yang na stong pa nyid de /
translated: Or, emptiness is the attainment of the faultless stage of emptiness.

original: de rtogs na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, when one realizes that, one practices generosity, etc. in a way that does not objectify the three spheres.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi skyon ni 'khor gsum dmigs pa dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi skyon ni 'khor gsum dmigs pa dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i dri ma'o //
translated: The faults of the perfections are the objectification of the three spheres and the defilements of stinginess, etc.

original: stong pa nyid ni dngos po dang / dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni dngos po dang / dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is the adherence to the nature of entity and non-entity, etc.

original: de med pas skyon med pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi dri ma med pa ni de dag gi rnam par dag pa'o //🔽des rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa @20a * //
analyzed: de med pas skyon med pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi dri ma med pa ni de dag gi rnam par dag pa'o // des rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa @20a * //
translated: Since that does not exist, there is the absence of faults, and the absence of the stain of characteristics is their purification.

original: thob pas rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thob pas rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: By that, the yogi/nī attains the state of omniscience through attaining the stages of the Joyful One, etc.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams phul du phyin par rnam par dag pa la bstan nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams phul du phyin par rnam par dag pa la bstan nas /
translated: Thus, after the perfections of generosity, etc. are taught in terms of their perfection and purity,

original: go rims bzhin du sa bcur rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sa bcur rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: they are respectively established as the ten stages.

original: de'i 'og tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one attains the state of omniscience.

original: stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa las kyang bstan te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa las kyang bstan te /
translated: This is also taught in the Purification of Omniscience:🔽“The meaning of ‘pervading’ and so forth is as explained.

original: kun du 'gro don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o / de ltar gsol ba btab nas /
analyzed: kun du 'gro don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o / de ltar gsol ba btab nas /
translated: Having thus supplicated,

original: da ni gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / tshe ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsol ba btab pa'i don la bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon du phyogs par mdzad nas /
analyzed: da ni gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / tshe ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsol ba btab pa'i don la bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon du phyogs par mdzad nas /
translated: now, in order to generate respect and to teach the nature of the request, the Bhagavān, facing the meaning of the request,

original: zhal gyis bzhes so //
analyzed: zhal gyis bzhes so //
translated: accepted it.

original: zhal gyis bzhes pa de yang nyan pa po'i bye brag dang / rang gi ngo bo rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhal gyis bzhes pa de yang nyan pa po'i bye brag dang / rang gi ngo bo rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
translated: That acceptance is twofold: due to the distinctions of the listeners and due to its own nature.

original: nyan pa po'i bye brag ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te /
analyzed: nyan pa po'i bye brag ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te /
translated: The distinctions of the listeners are said to be fourfold:

original: nyan pa dang / legs par nyan pa dang / rab tu nyan pa dang / yang dag par yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: nyan pa dang / legs par nyan pa dang / rab tu nyan pa dang / yang dag par yid la byed pa ste /
translated: listening, listening well, listening thoroughly, and proper mental engagement.🔽The vessel is either overturned, leaky,

original: snod ni khas phub rdol ba dang // mi gtsang ba yi gnyen po'am //
analyzed: snod ni khas phub rdol ba dang // mi gtsang ba yi gnyen po'am //
translated: or defiled,

original: gzu bo la sogs yon tan ldan //
analyzed: gzu bo la sogs yon tan ldan //
translated: You have good qualities, such as being healthy,

original: khyod kyis nyon la gzhan du min //
analyzed: khyod kyis nyon la gzhan du min //
translated: Listen, and not otherwise.

original: gang phyir tshad ma ldan pas na //
analyzed: gang phyir tshad ma ldan pas na //
translated: Because you are endowed with valid cognition,

original: thog ma bar dang tha mar dge //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang tha mar dge //
translated: You are virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end.🔽You are the one who causes the exhaustion

original: chung ngu 'bring dang chen po yi //
analyzed: chung ngu 'bring dang chen po yi //
translated: Of the small, medium, and great faults,

original: nyes pa rnams ni zad byed dang // tshig 'bru don dang gnyi ga shes //
analyzed: nyes pa rnams ni zad byed dang // tshig 'bru don dang gnyi ga shes //
translated: And you know the words, meanings, and both,

original: mngon sum la sogs mi 'gal ba //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs mi 'gal ba //
translated: You are not in contradiction with direct perception, and so forth.🔽You are the cause of the development of the mind

original: thos la sogs las blo bskyed dang // bdag sogs 'byor ba'i rgyu yin phyir //
analyzed: thos la sogs las blo bskyed dang // bdag sogs 'byor ba'i rgyu yin phyir //
translated: From hearing and so forth, and of the prosperity of myself and others.

original: char pa 'bab na bum pa khas phub pa'i nang du chu cung zad kyang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: char pa 'bab na bum pa khas phub pa'i nang du chu cung zad kyang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as when it rains, not even a little water goes into a pot with its opening facing up,

original: khyod snod khas phub pa lta bur nyan par ma byed cig bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khyod snod khas phub pa lta bur nyan par ma byed cig bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Do not listen like a pot with its opening facing up.

original: legs par zhes gsungs po //
analyzed: legs par zhes gsungs po //
translated: In order to say this, “properly” is stated.🔽Just as water that has gone into a pot with a hole will not remain, in the same way, do not listen

original: bum pa rdol ba'i nang du ni chu song du zin kyang gnas par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod nyan par ma byed par /
analyzed: bum pa rdol ba'i nang du ni chu song du zin kyang gnas par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod nyan par ma byed par /
translated: Like a pot with a hole.

original: ci nas thos pa brtan par 'gyur ba de lta bur nyon cig ces bya ba'i phyir rab tu zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci nas thos pa brtan par 'gyur ba de lta bur nyon cig ces bya ba'i phyir rab tu zhes gsungs so //
translated: Listen in such a way that what you hear is stable.

original: bum pa mi gtsang ba'i nang du ni chu ci song ba de dag thams cad mi gtsang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bum pa mi gtsang ba'i nang du ni chu ci song ba de dag thams cad mi gtsang bar 'gyur te /
translated: Whatever water is put into an impure vessel becomes impure.

original: spyad du mi rung ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: spyad du mi rung ba de bzhin du /
translated: It is not suitable for use.

original: khyod kyis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i mi gtsang bar ma byed cig ces bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khyod kyis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i mi gtsang bar ma byed cig ces bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In the same way, do not make your mind impure with improper attention.

original: tshul @20b bzhin yid la zung shig ces gsungs so //
analyzed: tshul @20b bzhin yid la zung shig ces gsungs so //
translated: Listen with proper attention.

original: yang na gzu bo lta bu dang / don du gnyer ba dang / rtog pa can du gyis la nyon cig ces gsungs te /
analyzed: yang na gzu bo lta bu dang / don du gnyer ba dang / rtog pa can du gyis la nyon cig ces gsungs te /
translated: Or, listen as a person who is sick, who is seeking a remedy, and who is intelligent.

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The words properly, etc., are to be applied in order.

original: de ltar byas na khyod kyis mnyan pa 'bras bu yod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar byas na khyod kyis mnyan pa 'bras bu yod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you do so, your listening will be fruitful.

original: de lta ma yin na mi 'gyur bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mi 'gyur bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: If you do not, it will not be.

original: yang na gang gi phyir thog ma nyid du tshad ma dang ldan pas dge ba de'i phyir legs par nyon zhes gsung so //
analyzed: yang na gang gi phyir thog ma nyid du tshad ma dang ldan pas dge ba de'i phyir legs par nyon zhes gsung so //
translated: Or else, because it is virtuous at the beginning, in the middle and at the end, therefore, it is said: “listen well”, “pay attention well”, “apply your mind well”.

original: gang gi phyir tha mar yang dge ba de'i phyir rab tu nyon cig ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha mar yang dge ba de'i phyir rab tu nyon cig ces gsungs so //
translated: Because it is virtuous at the beginning, therefore, it is said: “listen well”.🔽Because it is virtuous at the end, therefore, it is said: “pay attention well”.

original: gang gi phyir tha mar yang dge ba de'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byos shig ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha mar yang dge ba de'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byos shig ces gsungs so //
translated: Because it is virtuous at the beginning, in the middle and at the end, therefore, it is said: “apply your mind well”.

original: yang na nyes pa chung ngu dang 'bring po dang / chen po rnams kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang na nyes pa chung ngu dang 'bring po dang / chen po rnams kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Or else, because it is the antidote to the lesser, middling and greater faults, therefore, the words “listen well”, etc. are to be connected in the appropriate order.

original: yang na tshig 'bru dang / don dang / gnyi ga 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na tshig 'bru dang / don dang / gnyi ga 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir /
translated: Or else, in order to cause one to retain the letter, the meaning and both,

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: the words “listen well”, etc. are to be connected in the appropriate order.

original: yang na mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma gnyi ga dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma gnyi ga dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir /

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //

analyzed: yang na thos pa las byung ba las sogs pa'i shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Or else, it is the cause of the three kinds of wisdom that arise from hearing and so on.

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The words “well” and so on are to be applied in order.

analyzed: yang na bdag dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyi ga'i don gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Or else, it is the cause of one’s own aim, the aim of others, and the aim of both.

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The words “well” and so on are to be applied in order.

original: yang na mthong ba la sogs pa'i lam gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na mthong ba la sogs pa'i lam gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Or else, it is the cause of the three paths of seeing and so on.

original: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The words “well” and so on are to be applied in order.

original: don gsol zhal gyis bzhes pas na /
analyzed: don gsol zhal gyis bzhes pas na /
translated: Since he accepted the request for the meaning,

original: de yis bdag nyid gsol bar phyogs //
analyzed: de yis bdag nyid gsol bar phyogs //
translated: he turned himself toward the request.

original: thub pa sems can don mkhyen phyir //
analyzed: thub pa sems can don mkhyen phyir //
translated: The Sage, knowing the meaning of sentient beings,

original: 'dir ni bsrung ba la sogs gsungs //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsrung ba la sogs gsungs //
translated: here taught the protection and so on.

original: de ltar 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The line I will do as you say and so forth

original: mngon du phyogs pa mdzad pa bstan to //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa mdzad pa bstan to //
translated: demonstrates the turning toward [enlightenment].

original: da ni bsrung ba bstan te /
analyzed: da ni bsrung ba bstan te /
translated: Now, the protection [of the mind] is taught.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: And that is of two kinds:

original: bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor dang / gsang sngags kyi yi ge'o//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor dang / gsang sngags kyi yi ge'o//
translated: the yoga of meditative stabilization and the syllables of the secret mantra.

original: @21a * // de la bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor ni //
analyzed: @21a * // de la bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor ni //
translated: The yoga of meditative stabilization is as follows.

original: yang dag tu na de chos kun //
analyzed: yang dag tu na de chos kun //
translated: In reality, all phenomena

original: dngos po'i ngo bor khas mi len //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bor khas mi len //
translated: are not accepted as having the nature of entities.

original: rkyen la rag las 'byung phyir te //
analyzed: rkyen la rag las 'byung phyir te //
translated: Because they arise in dependence on conditions,

original: sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu bzhin //
translated: like illusions, dreams, and mirages.

original: dgag par bya ba med pas na //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba med pas na //
translated: Since there is nothing to be refuted,

original: yang dag tu na bdag med mngon //
analyzed: yang dag tu na bdag med mngon //
translated: in reality, the absence of self is evident.

original: yang dag mkhyen te chos rnams kun //
analyzed: yang dag mkhyen te chos rnams kun //
translated: The one with perfect knowledge

original: thams cad dngos por 'dzin mi mdzad //
analyzed: thams cad dngos por 'dzin mi mdzad //
translated: does not apprehend any phenomena as entities.

original: chos thams cad ni rkyen la rag las te 'byung ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rkyen la rag las te 'byung ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du //
translated: Because all phenomena arise in dependence on conditions, and like illusions and so forth,

original: yang dag par na dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par na dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: in reality, they do not have the nature of entities.

original: de bzhin du skyes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yang dag par med do zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du skyes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yang dag par med do zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: So too, it should be said that the nature of production and so on is also not real.

original: de ltar gyur na chos thams cad yang dag par dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na chos thams cad yang dag par dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since all phenomena are not real entities,

original: yang dag par dgag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par dgag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: they are not related to real negation.

original: mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo bsangs la sogs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo bsangs la sogs pa bzhin te /
translated: Like the blueness and so on of a barren woman’s son,

original: dgag par bya ba med pas dgag pa yang mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba med pas dgag pa yang mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the negation does not apply because there is no object of negation.

original: mi mthun pa rtag pa yin na ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa rtag pa yin na ni /
translated: If the dissimilar class is permanent,

original: dgag pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dgag pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the negation would be similar to that.

original: de ltar na chos thams cad don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na chos thams cad don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: Thus, all phenomena are not ultimately of the nature of nonentity.

original: de bzhin du ma skyes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma skyes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: So too, it should be applied that they are not of the nature of nonproduction and so on.🔽Or,

original: yang na / tshad ma ldan pa ma yin pas //🔽yod med la sogs mtshan nyid du //
analyzed: yang na / tshad ma ldan pa ma yin pas // yod med la sogs mtshan nyid du //
translated: since it is not endowed with valid knowledge,

original: de ni chos kun khas mi len //
analyzed: de ni chos kun khas mi len //
translated: it does not accept all phenomena🔽as characteristics such as existent and nonexistent.

original: de phyir mkhas pa 'dzin mi byed //
analyzed: de phyir mkhas pa 'dzin mi byed //
translated: Therefore, the wise do not grasp.

original: mngon par zhen par mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “do not cling.”

original: tshad ma dang mi ldan pa'i ngo bo ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: tshad ma dang mi ldan pa'i ngo bo ni bshad zin to //
translated: The nature of the non-possession of valid cognition has been explained.

original: de phyir de ni stong pa min //
analyzed: de phyir de ni stong pa min //
translated: Therefore, it is not empty.

original: mi stong ma yin yod med min //
analyzed: mi stong ma yin yod med min //
translated: It is not non-empty, not existent, not non-existent,

original: mi skye ma yin skye min zhes //
analyzed: mi skye ma yin skye min zhes //
translated: Not arising, not ceasing, and so on—

original: bya ba la sogs bcom ldan gsungs //
analyzed: bya ba la sogs bcom ldan gsungs //
translated: this has been taught by the Bhagavān.

original: bsam gtan gyi ni lam 'di yis //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ni lam 'di yis //
translated: By this path of meditative concentration,

original: gsang sngags tshig rnams bsams na ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshig rnams bsams na ni //
translated: if one contemplates the words of the mantra,

original: 'bras bu rdzogs par thob 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: 'bras bu rdzogs par thob 'gyur gyi //
translated: one will attain the perfect result,

original: 'dod pa nyi tshes de lta min //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyi tshes de lta min //
translated: but not through mere desire.

original: rnal 'byor can bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor 'di la gnas shing gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams brjod na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor can bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor 'di la gnas shing gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams brjod na /
translated: The practitioner, abiding in this yoga of meditative concentration and reciting the mantra syllables,

original: yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par 'thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par 'thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: will attain the perfect result desired by the mind.

original: sems phyi rol du bltas pas bton na ni gsang sngags rnams ngo bo nyid shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas 'bras bu 'thob par lta 'gyur mod kyi rdzogs par ni ma yin no //🔽tshig rnams re re'i @21b rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: sems phyi rol du bltas pas bton na ni gsang sngags rnams ngo bo nyid shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas 'bras bu 'thob par lta 'gyur mod kyi rdzogs par ni ma yin no // tshig rnams re re'i @21b rnal 'byor la //
translated: If the mind is directed outward, then the mantras, which are endowed with an inconceivable nature, will certainly bring about the attainment of the result, but not the perfection.🔽The yogi should recite the mantra

original: mngon du phyogs par byed bzhin du //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs par byed bzhin du //
translated: while attending to each syllable,

original: gsang sngags ran par brjod bya ste //
analyzed: gsang sngags ran par brjod bya ste //
translated: pronouncing the mantra correctly,

original: de phyir 'dir ni tshig smos so //
analyzed: de phyir 'dir ni tshig smos so //
translated: therefore the word is mentioned here.

original: myur ches pa dang / dal ches pa dang / mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba ni ran pa nyid de gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams la sems gtod pa'o //
analyzed: myur ches pa dang / dal ches pa dang / mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba ni ran pa nyid de gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams la sems gtod pa'o //
translated: Correct pronunciation is free from the faults of being too fast, too slow, unclear, and so on. It is the focusing of the mind on the syllables of the mantra.

original: tshig re re'i rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs par byed cing gsang sngags ran par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: tshig re re'i rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs par byed cing gsang sngags ran par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The yogi should recite the mantra while attending to each syllable, pronouncing the mantra correctly.

original: de bas na tshig smos so //
analyzed: de bas na tshig smos so //
translated: Therefore the word is mentioned here.

original: de lta ma yin na /🔽gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzung bar bya //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na / gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzung bar bya //
translated: Otherwise,🔽it would be appropriate to say

original: zhes de skad 'byung ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes de skad 'byung ba'i rigs so //
translated: one should retain the dharani mantra.

original: yi ge re re bsam pa yi //🔽rnal 'byor sus kyang mi nus te //
analyzed: yi ge re re bsam pa yi // rnal 'byor sus kyang mi nus te //

original: tshig re nas ni nges par yang //
analyzed: tshig re nas ni nges par yang //
translated: But one should practice with each individual word.

original: brjod par bya bas de smos so //
analyzed: brjod par bya bas de smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: de smos zhes bya ba ni tshig smos pa'o //
analyzed: de smos zhes bya ba ni tshig smos pa'o //

analyzed: gal te yi ge re re la rnal 'byor du byed nus na lta rab tu legs pa yin no //
translated: If one can practice yoga with each individual letter, that is excellent.

original: gal te mi nus na tshig re re la ni bsgrims te yang bya dgos te /
analyzed: gal te mi nus na tshig re re la ni bsgrims te yang bya dgos te /
translated: But if one cannot, one should practice with each individual word.🔽Thus:

original: 'di ltar / rnal 'byor med pa'i gsang sngags 'di //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnal 'byor med pa'i gsang sngags 'di //
translated: This mantra without yoga

original: de ltar 'bras bu ston mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu ston mi 'gyur //
translated: will not give its fruit.

original: gsang sngags tshig ni gsang sngags te //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshig ni gsang sngags te //
translated: The word of the mantra is the mantra,

original: de phyir rnal 'byor med mi bya //
analyzed: de phyir rnal 'byor med mi bya //
translated: therefore one should not practice without yoga.

original: 'di'i don ni brda phrad par zad do //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni brda phrad par zad do //
translated: The meaning of this is clear.

original: gzungs kyi don gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams yin pas gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi don gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams yin pas gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams so //
translated: They are the words of the mantra for the meaning of the dhāraṇī, therefore they are the words of the dhāraṇī mantra.

original: da ni gzungs kyi ngo bo brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gzungs kyi ngo bo brjod par bya ste /

analyzed: gsungs pa'i ming ni 'dogs pa dang // 'thob pa'i thabs ni bstan pa dang // des shes bya la sogs tshig gis //
translated: and by the words “that which is to be known” and so forth,

original: gzungs ni 'og nas 'byung ba nyid //
analyzed: gzungs ni 'og nas 'byung ba nyid //
translated: the dhāraṇī is just as it occurs below.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das des //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das des //
translated: For what reason did that Blessed One

original: 'di ni sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gsungs pa'i ming 'dogs par mdzad
analyzed: 'di ni sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gsungs pa'i ming 'dogs par mdzad
translated: designate the name of the Buddha-recollection taught by “Śāriputra, this is called the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s entry into the non-grasping of all dharmas,” and so on?

original: do // gang gi phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'thob pa'i thabs bstan to //
analyzed: do // gang gi phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'thob pa'i thabs bstan to //
translated: For what reason did the Blessed One then teach the method of attainment beginning with “from that time forth”?

original: gang gi phyir des sgo mtha' yas bsgrub pa'i gzung 'di bsgrubs te zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir des sgo mtha' yas bsgrub pa'i gzung 'di bsgrubs te zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir /
translated: For what reason did he say “by that, this dhāraṇī is accomplished, which accomplishes the infinite doors”?

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'og nas 'byung ba nyid gzungs yin par 'dzin to //
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'og nas 'byung ba nyid gzungs yin par 'dzin to //
translated: I hold that the Buddha-recollection that occurs below is the dhāraṇī itself.

original: de lta ma yin gyi gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams gzungs @22a * //
analyzed: de lta ma yin gyi gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams gzungs @22a * //
translated: It is not so.🔽

original: nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: nyid yin na ni /
translated: If the letters of the mantra are not the dhāraṇī,

original: 'di rigs pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di rigs pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then this would not be logical.

original: skabs ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skabs ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not the proper occasion,

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bstan pa'i skabs kyis bar du chod pa'i phyir dang / gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams ni yi ge'i 'bru dang / sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nges par gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bstan pa'i skabs kyis bar du chod pa'i phyir dang / gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams ni yi ge'i 'bru dang / sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nges par gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: for the occasion is interrupted by the teaching on the mindfulness of the Buddha, and because the letters of the mantra are by nature syllables and sounds, which are apprehended by the eye and ear consciousnesses.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'di zhes gsungs pa brjod bya min //
analyzed: 'di zhes gsungs pa brjod bya min //
translated: it is not the expressed meaning that is said to be “this.”

original: 'og nas 'byung ba'i chings thugs la bzhag nas /
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i chings thugs la bzhag nas /
translated: Having in mind the larger context that will be explained below,

original: 'di zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: it is said to be “this.”

original: 'dzin pa 'dir ni don las bzhed //
analyzed: 'dzin pa 'dir ni don las bzhed //
translated: Here, “grasping” is accepted as meaning “object.”

original: rlom sems mngon par zhen pa ste //
analyzed: rlom sems mngon par zhen pa ste //
translated: Conceit is the strong adherence to the notion of “I.”

original: mi dmigs phyir na de med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs phyir na de med do //
translated: Since it is not apprehended, it does not exist.

original: 'dzin pa ni 'dir don la rtogs par bzhed kyi /
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni 'dir don la rtogs par bzhed kyi /
translated: Here, “grasping” is accepted as meaning “object,”

original: yi ge las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge las ni ma yin te /
translated: not the letters.

original: yi ge 'dzin pas ni phan yon 'di dag 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge 'dzin pas ni phan yon 'di dag 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One who grasps at the letters will not obtain these benefits.

original: rlom sems ni mngon par zhen pa yin pas de ltar na 'di ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlom sems ni mngon par zhen pa yin pas de ltar na 'di ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since conceit is clinging, it is as follows.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed ces bya ba ni mngon par zhen par mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / ci'i phyir mngon par zhen par mi byed ce na /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed ces bya ba ni mngon par zhen par mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / ci'i phyir mngon par zhen par mi byed ce na /
translated: The phrase “one should not conceive of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena as real” means that one should not cling to them as real. Why should one not cling to them?

original: de'i phyir dmigs par mi byed ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs par mi byed ces gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that one should not objectify them.

original: yang na ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ngo bo nyid dang bcas par rlom sems su mi byed par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ngo bo nyid dang bcas par rlom sems su mi byed par nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should understand that one should not conceive of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena as real because they are essenceless.🔽The pleasant, the unpleasant, and both,

original: mi sdug gnyi ga ma yin sdug / sdug pa de yang rnam gnyis 'dod //
analyzed: mi sdug gnyi ga ma yin sdug / sdug pa de yang rnam gnyis 'dod //
translated: The pleasant is also held to be of two kinds.

original: chos rnams thams cad thub pa yis //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad thub pa yis //
translated: The Muni has subsumed all phenomena

original: rnam pa bzhir ni bsdu ba mdzad //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhir ni bsdu ba mdzad //
translated: Within four alternatives.

original: chos rnam pa bzhi ni mi sdug pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdug ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: chos rnam pa bzhi ni mi sdug pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdug ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The four types of phenomena are: the nature of the repulsive, the nature of the attractive, and the nature of neither.

original: de dag kyang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag kyang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: They are also twofold, according to whether they are contaminated or uncontaminated.

original: de bas na rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, there are four types.

original: ji ste ci'i phyir chos rnams rnam pa bzhir bstan par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ji ste ci'i phyir chos rnams rnam pa bzhir bstan par mdzad ce na /
translated: Why are phenomena taught to be of four types?🔽It is said:

original: smras pa / gnod sems gti mug 'dod chags rnams //
analyzed: smras pa / gnod sems gti mug 'dod chags rnams //
translated: Hatred, delusion, and desire

original: de yi sgo nas 'byung phyir ro //
analyzed: de yi sgo nas 'byung phyir ro //
translated: arise from that.

original: spang ba'i thabs ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: spang ba'i thabs ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to establish the means of abandoning them,

original: de dag dngos po med par bstan //
analyzed: de dag dngos po med par bstan //
translated: they are taught to be unreal.

original: zhe sdang ni me sdug pa las 'byung /
analyzed: zhe sdang ni me sdug pa las 'byung /
translated: Hatred arises from the repulsive.

original: gti mug ni dngos po rnam pa gsum char las 'byung /
analyzed: gti mug ni dngos po rnam pa gsum char las 'byung /
translated: Delusion arises from all three types of phenomena.

original: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa yin te /
translated: Desire is the root of cyclic existence.

original: @22b de bas na de dag spang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @22b de bas na de dag spang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the means of abandoning them,

original: dngos po rnam pa gsum po de dag ngo bo nyid med pa ston par mdzad de /
analyzed: dngos po rnam pa gsum po de dag ngo bo nyid med pa ston par mdzad de /
translated: He teaches that those three kinds of things are essenceless.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: des gang chags par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: des gang chags par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: He does not see those things by which one might become attached.

original: gang gi phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because he does not falsely project the conditioned and the unconditioned,

original: mi sdug pa rnams la smod pa mi byed de /
analyzed: mi sdug pa rnams la smod pa mi byed de /
translated: he does not disparage the unattractive.

original: bshung bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bshung bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that he does not despise them.

original: bar ma rnams la btang snyoms su mi byed de /🔽de dag gi rjes su chags pa dang / khro ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bar ma rnams la btang snyoms su mi byed de / de dag gi rjes su chags pa dang / khro ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: He does not ignore the neutral.🔽They are not objects of attachment and aversion.

original: btang snyoms su gzhag par bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: btang snyoms su gzhag par bya ba rnams so //
translated: He is indifferent to them.

original: sdug pa rnams len par mi byed de /
analyzed: sdug pa rnams len par mi byed de /
translated: He does not accept the attractive.

original: srid pas bdag gir byed pa ni len pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pas bdag gir byed pa ni len pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because appropriation is the appropriation of existence.

original: sdug pa zag pa med pa la brtson par mi byed de //
analyzed: sdug pa zag pa med pa la brtson par mi byed de //
translated: He does not strive for the attractive that is uncontaminated.

original: de dag ni rab tu mngon par 'du byed pa chen pos bsgrub par bya bas brtsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni rab tu mngon par 'du byed pa chen pos bsgrub par bya bas brtsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are to be undertaken because they are to be accomplished by great manifest effort.🔽The object to be attained, the attainment of that,🔽the cultivation of those very things,🔽the abandonment of the objects to be abandoned,

original: 'di la thob bya rnam 'thob dang // de dag nyid ni bsgom pa dang // spang bya rnams ni spang ba dang // 'phel ba thams cad yin par bzhed //
analyzed: 'di la thob bya rnam 'thob dang // de dag nyid ni bsgom pa dang // spang bya rnams ni spang ba dang // 'phel ba thams cad yin par bzhed //
translated: and the increase of all are accepted.

original: 'thob par bya bar 'os pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'thob par bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'thob par bya bar 'os pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'thob par bya ba rnams so //
translated: Those that are worthy of being attained are the objects to be attained.

original: de dag kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams te /
analyzed: de dag kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams te /
translated: They are the uncontaminated dharmas and the contaminated dharmas.

original: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are the dhyanas, the formless states, the superknowledges, the sky treasury samadhi, and so on.

original: bsgom par bya ba ni de dag nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba ni de dag nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du goms par bya ba'o //
translated: Cultivation is the repeated practice of those very things in order to stabilize them.

original: spang bar bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa rnams te de dag ni spang bar 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa rnams te de dag ni spang bar 'ong ba'am /
translated: The objects to be abandoned are the contaminated dharmas. They are to be abandoned because they are to be rejected.

original: spang bar 'os pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spang bar 'os pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are to be abandoned.

original: 'thob par bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba'i 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du khyad par 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'thob par bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba'i 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du khyad par 'thob pa'o //
translated: The increase of what is to be attained and what is to be cultivated is the attainment of higher and higher distinctions.

original: spang ba'i 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du nyon mongs pa spangs pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du nyon mongs pa spangs pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The increase of what is to be abandoned is the attainment of the definite abandonment of higher and higher defilements.🔽Because of that, the yogi/nī does not falsely project

original: gang gi phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems mi byed pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems mi byed pa /
translated: conditioned and unconditioned phenomena.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor can de ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor can de ni //
translated: Therefore, that yogi/nī🔽does not apply the knowledge

original: thos dang bsam la sogs byung ba'i //🔽shes pa rnams kyis nam du yang //
analyzed: thos dang bsam la sogs byung ba'i // shes pa rnams kyis nam du yang //
translated: arisen from listening, reflection, and so on

original: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos //🔽de dag 'thob sogs sbyor mi byed //
analyzed: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos // de dag 'thob sogs sbyor mi byed //
translated: to conditioned and unconditioned phenomena

original: 'thob par bya ba'i @23a * //
analyzed: 'thob par bya ba'i @23a * //
translated: in any way whatsoever.

original: phyir thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa rnams kyis go rims bzhin du sbyor bar mi byed pa'i phyir mi byed /🔽rnam par mi byed /
analyzed: phyir thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa rnams kyis go rims bzhin du sbyor bar mi byed pa'i phyir mi byed / rnam par mi byed /
translated: In order to attain, they do not apply the knowledge arisen from listening, reflection, and meditation, respectively.🔽They do not make,🔽do not create,

original: mngon par 'du mi byed ces gsungs te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed ces gsungs te /
translated: and do not fabricate.

original: spang ba la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //🔽yang na chung 'bring chen po yi //
analyzed: spang ba la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o // yang na chung 'bring chen po yi //
translated: Abandonment and so forth should be explained in the same way.🔽Or, they do not apply through

original: sbyor ba rnams kyis sbyor mi byed //
analyzed: sbyor ba rnams kyis sbyor mi byed //
translated: the small, medium, and great preparations.

original: 'thob par bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'thob par bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to attain, they do not apply in sequence and so forth.

original: spang ba la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //🔽de bzhin zag bcas slob sogs kyi //
analyzed: spang ba la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o // de bzhin zag bcas slob sogs kyi //
translated: Abandonment and so forth should be explained in the same way.🔽Likewise, they do not apply through

original: lam rnams kyis kyang sbyor mi byed //
analyzed: lam rnams kyis kyang sbyor mi byed //
translated: the contaminated paths of training and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor pa de 'thob pa la sogs pa la zhes bya bar snyegs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de 'thob pa la sogs pa la zhes bya bar snyegs te /
translated: The yogi does not apply to attainment and so forth.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni mi slob pa'i lam bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni mi slob pa'i lam bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase “and so forth” includes the path of no-more-learning.

original: ci'i phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rlom sems su mi byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rlom sems su mi byed ce na /
translated: Why, through not observing conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, does he not falsely project?

original: de'i phyir mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it says “the associated phenomena” and so forth.

original: rgyu dang rkyen nam chags sogs kyi //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen nam chags sogs kyi //
translated: Through causes and conditions, such as attachment and so forth,

original: bag nyal rnams dang ldan de dag /'dir ni mtshungs ldan shes bya ste //
analyzed: bag nyal rnams dang ldan de dag /'dir ni mtshungs ldan shes bya ste //
translated: Those that possess the latent states are said to be associated.

original: bzlog pa las ni ldan pa min //
analyzed: bzlog pa las ni ldan pa min //
translated: Those that are the opposite are said to be non-associated.

original: rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang ldan pas na mtshungs par ldan pa dag ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang ldan pas na mtshungs par ldan pa dag ste /
translated: Those that possess causes and conditions are said to be associated.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos mtha' dag go //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos mtha' dag go //
translated: They are all conditioned phenomena.

original: de las bzlog pa ni ldan pa yin pa dag ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni ldan pa yin pa dag ste /
translated: Those that are the opposite of that are said to be non-associated.

original: 'dus ma byas rnams so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnams so //
translated: They are unconditioned phenomena.

original: yang na 'dod chags pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lta bar gyur pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa dag ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dod chags pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lta bar gyur pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa dag ste /
translated: Or, those that possess attachment and so on, as well as the afflicted views, are said to be associated.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: They are all contaminated phenomena.

original: de las bzlog pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa dag ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa dag ste /
translated: Those that are the opposite of that are said to be non-associated.

original: zag pa med pa rnams so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnams so //
translated: They are all uncontaminated phenomena.
